SA11sanssr_pu:342: paramo hy ayaṃ śāriputra lābho yad uta gṛhāvāsān niṣkramaṇam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:345: yathā janmāntareṣv ayaṃ doṣo na bhavati tathātraiva vakṣyamāṇam ity āstāṃ tāvad etat //
SA11sanssr_pu:346: tad evaṃ samāttasaṃvarasya sāmānyam āpattilakṣaṇam ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:347: yenāpattilakṣaṇena yuktaṃ vastu svayam apy utprekṣya pariharen na cāpattipratirūpakeṣv annāpattipratirūpakeṣu ca saṃmuhyeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:348: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ varttamānānāgatasarvaduṣkhadaurmanasyopaśamāya varttamānānāgatasukhasaumanasyotpādāya ca niḥśāṭhyataḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥparākramaiḥ prayatnaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:349: yadi tu tatpratyayasāmagrīṃ nānveṣate tadannantarāya pratikārāya na ghaṭate alpaduṣkhadaurmanasyaṃ bahuduṣkhadaurmanasyapratikārabhūtaṃ notpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:350: mahārthasiddhyarthaṃ cālpārthahāniṃ na karoti kṣaṇam apy upekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:352: saṃkṣepato 'nnāpattiḥ svaśaktyaviśayeṣu kāryeṣu tatra niṣphalatayā śikṣyāprajñaptyabhāvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:354: yatra svaśaktyagocare 'pi tyāgasāmarthyād āpattiḥ syāt tan na cintyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:355: sāmānyapāpadeśanā na ... vāt tu tato muktiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:361: nirūpya yathārham atikrāmaty antaśaś caṇḍāladāsenāpi coditaḥ sāpattiko bhavati / kutaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:363: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣi ... bhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:369: yasya kasyacin maitreya ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:370: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā buddhasaṃjñotpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:373: yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:374: tatra maitreya ya imāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipen naitāni buddhabhāṣitānīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:375: teṣu cāgauravam utpādayet pudgalavidveṣeṇa tena sarvabuddhabhāṣitaṃ pratibhānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:377: yaḥ punar etad abhyāsārthaṃ vyutpāditam icchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:378: tenātra śikṣāsamuccaye tāvac caryāmukhamātraśikṣaṇārtham abhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ śikṣārambhasyaiva mahāphalatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:380_0: yaś ca mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo
SA11sanssr_pu:380_2: evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:381: yo vānyo mañjuśrīr bodhisatva imān evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā ekāntena gatvā cittenābhinirūpayed imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣiṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:382: so 'śikṣito 'pi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'syāṃ śikṣyāyāṃ chandiko vatataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:383: na tv eva tad dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastv iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:384: tasmād evam anuśaṃsadarśinā bodhisatvena na kathaṃcin nivarttitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:386: tatra mañjuśrīr ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ satvas teṣām ekaikaḥ satvo rājā bhavej jambūdvīpādhipatis te sarvae evaṃ ghoṣayeyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:387_0: yo mahāyānam udgrahiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravarttayiṣyati
SA11sanssr_pu:387_1: tasya nakhachedena māsaṃ pañcapalikena divasenāvatārayiṣyāmaḥ taṃ caitenāpakrameṇa
SA11sanssr_pu:388: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatva evam ucyamāno no trasyati na saṃtrāsam āpsyate 'ntaśa ekacittotpādenāpi na bibheti na viṣīdati na vicikitsate /
SA11sanssr_pu:389: uttari ca saddharmmaparigrahārtham abhiyujyate pāṭhasvādhyāyābhimukto viharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:390: ayaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaś cittaśūro dānaśūraḥ śīlaśūraḥ kṣāntiśūraḥ vīryaśūraḥ dhyānaśūraḥ prajñāśūraḥ samādhiśūraḥ iti vaktavyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:391: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na kupyati na ruṣyati na khila doṣacittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:392: sa mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo brahmasama indrasamo 'kampya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:406: kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvā bodhisatvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:408: na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyam annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:409: kiṃ tarhi yānīmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā /
SA11sanssr_pu:410: bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptāni teṣu teṣu mayā śikṣitavyam iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:411: tasmād asmadvidhena mandabuddhinā durvijñeyo vistaroktatvād bodhisatvasya saṃvaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:414: katamāni ca tāni marmasthānāni yāni hi sūtrānteṣu mahāyānābhiratānām arthāyoktāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:421: yo bodhisatvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtena duṣkham upagāmī /
SA11sanssr_pu:422: saced bodhisatvasya taṃ mārgaṃ parigṛhyāvasthitasyāpi kalpakoṭer atyayenaikaṃ sukhacittam utpadyetāntaśo niṣadya cittam api /
SA11sanssr_pu:423: tatra bodhisatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ sarvasatvānām ātyayikaṃ parigṛhyaitad api me varjayan niṣīdāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:426: pañcemāni devaputrānantaryāṇi yair ānantaryaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ kṣipram annuttarāsamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:428: yadā devaputra bodhisatvo 'dhyāśayaty annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya nāntarā śravakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ devaputra prathamam ānantaryaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:429: sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā mātsaryacittena sārddhaṃ sa nyasatīdaṃ devaputra dvitīyam ānantaryam /
SA11sanssr_pu:430: sarvasatvā mayā trātavyā ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā sīdatīdaṃ devaputra tṛtīyam ānantaryam /
SA11sanssr_pu:431: annutpannāniruddhān sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā dṛṣṭigateṣu prapatatīdaṃ devaputra caturtham ānantaryam /
SA11sanssr_pu:432: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā tiṣṭhati na viṣṭhīvati aprāptāyāṃ sarvajñatāyām idaṃ devaputra pañcamam ānantaryam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:433: tasmād evam ātmabhāvabhogapuṇyānām aviratam utsargarakṣāśuddhivṛddhayo yathāyogaṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:434: tatra tāvad utsargārthaṃ parigrahadoṣabhāvanādvāreṇa vairāgyam utpādayet tyāgānuśaṃsāṃś ca bhāvayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:436: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye 'smin pūtike samyag /
SA11sanssr_pu:439: te yānti narakān ghorān mṛtyuyānagatābudhā / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:441: ye kecit satvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahas tatra nidānamūlam /
SA11sanssr_pu:445: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu parakīyasaṃjñām utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:450: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:454: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:455: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam /
SA11sanssr_pu:460: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:471: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premotpadyate tathānyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:473: samyakprayuktasya samacittasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na viṣamacittasya bodhir na mithyāprayuktasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:475: ābhis tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣyānyatre 'mitrasaṃjñotpādayitavyāmitraṃ hy etan mama /
SA11sanssr_pu:477: yo 'ham asyārthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyā uddhuratād gatvāsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premotpādayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:479: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathāsya sarvasatveṣu putrapremānugatā maitry utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:486: neha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:488: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:491: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanaka upasaṃkramya kiñcid eva vastu yāceta /
SA11sanssr_pu:494: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam avaśyaṃ mamaitena vastunā vinābhāvo bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:496: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ cainaṃ tyakṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:497: etac ca vastu parityajyāhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:498: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca janayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:499: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum /
SA11sanssr_pu:500: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:508: mā paritāpsīs tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye /
SA11sanssr_pu:510: yathainaṃ ca tavābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasatvānāṃ ceti /
SA11sanssr_pu:514: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatra aprasādo bodhisatve vā yācanakasyeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:515: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ annavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cedaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:517: catvāra ime śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:524: yasyeme śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa paṇḍita.ir jñātavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:528: saṃkleśadharmo vatāyaṃ lokāmiṣaguruko vatāyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatāyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:529: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:546: na tad vastūpādātavyaṃ yasmin vastuni nāsya tyāgacittam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:548: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe notsarjanacittam utpādayen na sa parivāra upādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya parigrahabuddhir utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:549: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastūpādātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:551: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:553_0: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati
SA11sanssr_pu:553_1: tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastārthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādārthikebhyo
SA11sanssr_pu:554: māṃsaṃ māṃsārthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitārthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjārthikebhyo 'ṅgapratyaṅgāny aṅgapratyaṅgārthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śirorthikebhyaḥ parityakṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:555_0: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta dhanadhānyajātarūparajataratnābharaṇahayagajarathavāhanagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīpattanadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaputraduhitṛparivāreṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:556: api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:558: annapekṣo dāsyāmi satvānugrahāya satvakāruṇyena satvānukampayā teṣām eva satvānāṃ saṃgrahāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:559: yathā me 'mī satvāḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhiprāptasya dharmajānakāḥ syur iti / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:560_0: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:560_1: tvaktaḥ patrato vā hriyamāṇasya puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya naivaṃ bhavati vikalpo /
SA11sanssr_pu:561: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:562: api tu khalu punar avikalpa eva hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:563_0: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenāsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñotpādayitavyā
SA11sanssr_pu:563_1: yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenārthaḥ tat tad eva me harantu hastaṃ hastārthinaḥ pādaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:565: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu kṣapayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:566_0: tad yathāpi nāmemāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur
SA11sanssr_pu:566_1: vāyudhātuś ca nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:567: evam evāham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām upabhogyaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:568: sa imam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan kāyaduṣkhatāṃ ca pratyavekṣate kāyaduṣkhatayā ca na parikhidyate satvāvekṣayeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:570_0: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niryātayan sarvakuśalamūlopakāritvena sarvasatvānāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:570_1: kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāharan pradīpasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣūpanayan sukhasamam ātmānaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:571: dharmakukṣisamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati saṃdhārayan ālokasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv anugacchan jagatpratiṣṭhāpanasamam ātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:573_0: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nnuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:573_1: saṃdarśayamānaḥ annuttarasukhopadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ sūryasamam
SA11sanssr_pu:575: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ ... sarvajagatsthityātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:579: sarvajagato dānapatim ātmānam adhimucyamānaḥ sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:583: pratipattau cātmānaṃ sthāpayamāno bodhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇa udyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:584: dharmaratibhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvalokeṣv ādarśayamānaḥ saumanasyadātāram ātmānaṃ sarvasatvānām adhitiṣṭhan /
SA11sanssr_pu:585: annantaprītisaṃjananam ātmānaṃ sarvajagato niryātayamānaḥ sarvaśukladharmāya dvārabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃdhārayamānaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:589_0: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānam upasthāyakatvāya dadānaḥ yācanakeṣu nīcamanasikāracitto
SA11sanssr_pu:589_6: sārādānābhiprāya iti hi bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā
SA11sanssr_pu:589_7: maitryopacāravitatayā bhadre siṃhāsane rājārhe niṣādya taṃ yācanakam abhibhāṣate dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:590_0: ariṣṭacitto bhūtvākṣatacitto 'nnupahatacitto mahātman salā ... citto buddhavaṃśasaṃbhūtacitto
SA11sanssr_pu:590_2: jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakān mukhāj jihvā ... yācanakasya sarvaśarīram
SA11sanssr_pu:590_3: adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryopacārāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:591: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru /
SA11sanssr_pu:592_0: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi prītamānasa ātmanā pramudito hṛṣṭaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta
SA11sanssr_pu:592_1: iti sa śiraḥ parityajan sarvadharmāgraśiraḥ paramajñānam avataran sarvasatvaparitrāṇaśirobodhi
SA11sanssr_pu:592_2: ... gacchan sarvajagadagryaśiraḥ annupamajñānam abhilaṣan sarvadikchiraḥ prāptuṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:593_0: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ śraddhāhastaprayuktenānugrahacāritreṇa
SA11sanssr_pu:593_5: iti hi bodhisatvaḥ svaśarīram ākṣipya rudhiram anuprayacchan yācanakebhyaḥ praharṣitabodhicitto /
SA11sanssr_pu:594_2: prītiprasrabdhyā svaśarīrānapekṣacittaḥ svaśarīrād rudhiram anuprayacchan jñānāyatanamahāyānaprasṛtacetā
SA11sanssr_pu:594_3: mahāyānāvinaṣṭamanā iṣṭamanās tuṣṭamanāḥ prītamanāḥ muditamanā maitrymanāḥ sukhamanāḥ

SA11sanssr_pu:891_1: alabhamānasya cittaṃ duṣkhitaṃ syād daurmanasyaṃ ca bhavec cittasya vānyathātvaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:891_2: bhaved yenāsya kuśalamūlāntardhānaṃ bhaven na vā bhrājeran kuśalamūlāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:892: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaitad abhūt /
SA11sanssr_pu:893: yan nv aham ātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:896: mā rajodhātur ito dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kāye nipatatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:898: varaṃ khalu punar mamāyaṃ kāya evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu na ca niḥsāmarthyakriyayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:899: kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:900: yadi punar bhidyante kāmam evaṃrūpeṣv iva dharmasthāneṣu bhidyantāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:901: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvam asiñcat /
SA11sanssr_pu:903: na ca sadāprarudito bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvam abhūt /
SA11sanssr_pu:906: kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yāvajjīvaṃ na parityaktavyam api jīvitahetor iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:907: tad evaṃ kalyāṇamitrānutsargād ātmabhāvādīnāṃ rakṣādikaṃ kāryaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:908: sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni hi prāyaḥ sūtreṣv eva dṛśyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:909: teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptānīti vacanāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:910: tasmāt tadannīkṣaṇe mā bhūd āpattim āpannasyāpy ajñānād aviratir iti sadā sūtradarśanāyādaraḥ kāryaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:911: tad anena kalyāṇamitrānutsargeṇa sūtrāntadarśanena ca sarvaḥ saddharmaparigraha ukto bhavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:913: yābhir akṣaraniruktibhiḥ so 'nnabhilāpyo dharmaḥ sūcyate tāsām akṣaraniruktīnāṃ yadā dhāraṇaṃ deśanā yāvad /
SA11sanssr_pu:915_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakā eṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ deśayitāraḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:915_1: pratipattisārāś ca teṣām api dharmabhāṇakānāṃ yat sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanam utthānam
SA11sanssr_pu:915_2: upasthānaṃ gauravaṃ citrīkāraḥ śuśrūṣā ārakṣā parigrahaś cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāradānaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:918: adharme dharmavādināṃ ca pudgalānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:920: punar aparaṃ kulaputrāpratihatasantānasya sarvasatvapramokṣabuddher nirāmiṣacittasya parebhyo dharmadānam ayam api saddharmaparigrahaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:921: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo dharmaśravaṇahetuko vā dharmadeśanāhetuko vāntaśa ekakramavyatihāro 'ntaśa ekocchvāsapraśvāso vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:924: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣā ekāgrībhāvo damaḥ śama upaśamo vinayo 'yam ucyate saddharmaparigrahaḥ / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:925: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yena dharmeṇa yo 'dharmaḥ pravartate tasya dharmasyāparigraho 'nnupādānam ayam api saddharmaparigraha ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:930: na śuddhir na vṛddhis [doubtful] tataś ca so 'pi na bodhisatva ity avaśyakāryaḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:932: yāny apīmāni bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisatvapraṇidhānāni tāny ekasmin mahāpraṇidhāne upanikṣiptāny antargatāny anupratiṣṭhāni yad uta saddharmaparigrahe /
SA11sanssr_pu:935: syād yathāpi nāma devi mahābalavato 'pi puruṣasyālpo 'pi marmaṇi prahāro /
SA11sanssr_pu:937: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho vedhanīyo bhavati śokāvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:938: nāhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ vedhanīyaṃ śokāvahaṃ paridevakaraṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:940: punar āha / syād yathāpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate coccatvena vipulatvena ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:941_0: evam eva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na ca gṛhītacittasya saddharmaparigraho
SA11sanssr_pu:941_1: navayānasaṃprasthitānām api kāyajīvitasāpekṣāṇāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān
SA11sanssr_pu:943: parigṛhīto bhavatī jinebhir devebhi nāgebhi ca kinnarebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:946: sa śūnyakṣetreṣu na jātu jāyate sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:947: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmiṃl labhate prasādaṃ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
SA11sanssr_pu:948: jātismaro bhavati mahātmadharmā pravrajyalābhī bhavate punaḥ punaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:951: lābhī ca bhotī vidudhāraṇīye na naśyate kalpaśatebhi yacchubham /
SA11sanssr_pu:953: śakro 'tha brahmā tatha lokapālo manuṣyarājā bhuvi cakravarttī /
SA11sanssr_pu:954: sukhena saukhyena sa bodhi budhyate saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
SA11sanssr_pu:955: dvātriṃśa kāye 'sya bhavanti lakṣaṇāḥ aninditāṅgo bhavate vicakṣaṇaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:956: na tasya tṛptiṃ labhi prekṣamāṇāḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām //
SA11sanssr_pu:957: na tasya saṃmuhyati bodhi cittaṃ na coddhuraḥ pāramitā carīṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:958: asaṃgṛhītaḥ kuśalaḥ śatebhiḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:965: tatreti saddharmaparigrahe varttamānasyātmabhāvarakṣā cintyate yathā parān na nāśayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:966: idaṃ ca annarthavivarjanam āryagaganagañjasūtre saddharmadhāraṇodyatair bodhisatvair bhāṣitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:973: uccagghanāṃ tarjanāṃ ca avarṇam ayaśāṃsi ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:974: sarvāṃs tān marṣayiṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:980: maitrīṃ teṣu kariṣyāmo ye dharmeṣv apratiṣṭhitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:981: kāruṇyaṃ ca kariṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam //
SA11sanssr_pu:985: dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyeta eva hi //
SA11sanssr_pu:988: dānais tathāpi satkāraiḥ paripācyeha tān narān /
SA11sanssr_pu:992: dāntāḥ śāntāś ca muktāś ca grāme 'sminn avatīrya ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:994: sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:996: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
SA11sanssr_pu:998: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1002: badhakān yojayiṣyanti dharmeṣv eṣu hi vartatāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1003: ete dharmā na cāsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathañcana //
SA11sanssr_pu:1004: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1005: bhūtāṃ codana saṃśrutya idaṃ sūtraṃ pratikṣipan //
SA11sanssr_pu:1007: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam //
SA11sanssr_pu:1009: ceṣṭiṣyante tathā teṣāṃ kaścid dharmam imaṃ śṛṇot //
SA11sanssr_pu:1012: tasmin kāle vayaṃ kaṣṭe tyaktvā kāyaṃ sajīvitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1017: ye cāpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1019: adhimānīn na seveta [doubtful] vinayec cāgame sthitān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1023: strīpaṇḍakāś ca ye satvāḥ saṃstavaṃ tair vivarjayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1024: kuleṣu cāpi vadhukāḥ kumāryaś ca vivarjayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:1025: na tāḥ saṃmodayej jātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitṛṃ [doubtful] /
SA11sanssr_pu:1027: strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1028: naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cānye tādṛśā janāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1029: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1031: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito /
SA11sanssr_pu:1032: na caikaḥ praviśet tatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1033: ayaṃ cāparo 'nnartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmoktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1034: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyāciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1036: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1038: apy eva nāmāyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā romaharṣo vāsya bhaved iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1040: punar aparam anyavijñānasaṃjñino likhiṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1041: na vayam atrāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1042: evaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇā uccagghanto yāvat paryavāpsyantīti mārakarma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1047: punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyati imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvad vācayitu.ṃ dharmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1049: dharmabhāṇakaś ca deśāntaraṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇikāś ca neti neyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1050: evaṃ dharmabhāṇako maheccho bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇiko 'lpeccha iti neyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1051: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmety uktaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1056: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatva āraṇyako bhavati prāntaśayyāsanābhirato 'lpecchuḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'saṃsṛṣṭo gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1057_0: so 'lpārthatayālpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto
SA11sanssr_pu:1057_1: bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca dharmaśravaṇe vā dharmasāṃkathhye vārthaviniścayakathāyāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1060: tasyāraṇyavāsena caikārāmaratitayā ca kleśā na samudācaranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1063: sa tatra nātmārthāya pratipanno bhavati na parārthāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1064: ayaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasyāraṇyavāsapratisaṃyuktaḥ saptamo mārāṅkuśa iti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1065: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakāṇi pāpamitrāṇi sevate bhajate paryupāste /
SA11sanssr_pu:1066: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt saddharmaparigrahād vicchandya praviveke niyojayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1069: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti vaiyāvṛtyaṃ bodhisatvenāvaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1070: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin samaye viveke niyojayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1073: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nābhisaṃbhotsyase /
SA11sanssr_pu:1074: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum /
SA11sanssr_pu:1076: bodhisatvo 'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate yan nirvāṇaphalaṃ prāpnuyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:1079: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārāṅkuśāviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1080: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam annadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍaiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārāṅkuśa iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1081: yena caivaṃ saṃtatyārabdhavīryasya nirvedāt sarvathā bodhisatvabhāva eva bhavaty ata eva ratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1083: tathā cārabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1088: yad idam alpabalasya gurukarmārambho 'tivelāyāṃ vāparipakvādhimukter vā duṣkarakarmārambhas tad yathā svamāṃsadānādiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1091: anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena bodhicittavījanāśān mahataḥ phalarāśer nāśaḥ syāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:1094: nāpy akāla ity ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva notpādyābhyāsānārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1095: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svārthaghātibhyaḥ piśitāśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś cātmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1100: kathaṃ ca kulaputrātra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihāropāyakuśalo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1102: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjopasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1103: ye cānye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgāntarāyikās tān sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1113: tena ca kulaputraitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nāvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1115: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmādidhātuṃ āsravanti jāyante saṃsyandante saṃsargāc ca vinaśyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1117: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py annarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe /
SA11sanssr_pu:1118: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1121: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ca satvānām avarṇāyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nādhyāyāśayeneti asya vivarjanam atroktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1122: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1125: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1127: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1129: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1133: na jātu dharmadānasya antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1137: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1138: svapnāntare 'pi taccittaṃ kiṃ punar yadi jāgrataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1139: āha / yeṣu viratisthāneṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1140: samādāyeti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1142: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1143: nihatamānaś ca bhavatīrṣyamātsaryaparivarjakaś ca bhavati parasaṃpadaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā āttamanā bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1144: idam eva pātrabodhicittasya sphuṭataram asaṃpramoṣakāraṇaṃ yat tatraiva ratnakūṭe 'bhihitam /
SA11sanssr_pu:1148: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu vitarkayen naraḥ tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1149: avasādo 'py annartha etadvarjanaṃ ca ratnameghe dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1152: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś cādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn kalpān /
SA11sanssr_pu:1154: tan nāham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1156: ye 'pi te 'bhisaṃbuddhās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ye cābhisaṃbuddhyante ye vābhisaṃbhotsyante 'pīdṛśenaiva nayena īdṛśyā pratipadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1159: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāham annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1161: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣūdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1162: udārādhimuktikeṣu satveṣu hīnayānasaṃprakāśanād bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1163: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1166: yasya adhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1167: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:1168: sa itaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1169: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham //
SA11sanssr_pu:1172: tatra tathāgata eva sākṣīti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1175: annantā buddhabodhir nānādhimuktikatayā tathāgatānāṃ satveṣu dharmadeśanā pravarttatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1178: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ sā ratnarāśisūtrād āgatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1179: tatra vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarvabhikṣusaṃghasya cittam abhirādhayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1180: tatra ye bhikṣava āraṇyakāḥ prāntaśayyāsanikās teṣāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1181: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1182: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1184_0: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sa āraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo
SA11sanssr_pu:1184_1: bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā praṇītabhojaneṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:1185: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur yogācārī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1186: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇānulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1187: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogācārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe na uccaśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1190: praṇītāni ca saṃpriyāṇi yogācārabhūmyanukūlāni khādanīyabhojanīyāny upanāmayitavyāni // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1191: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dātavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1196: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena cāsya bhavitavyaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1198: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1199: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1201: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābha utsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham ekamānasaṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1203: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā samādāpya pratisaṃskartavya ity ājñā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1204: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:1205: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1207: yā staupikā antaśa ekadaśāpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1209: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe cīvaraṃ niryātitaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1210: tat tatraiva tathāgatacaitye vātātapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1211: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_0: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nāpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_1: vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyānām [doubtful] aiśvaryād ājñaptiṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1212_2: dadāti sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā narakagāmī bhavatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1213: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca bhavati khaṭacapeṭapracaṇḍaprahārāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1215: daṇḍakarmabhayatarjitaṃ bhikṣuṃ karoty akālapreṣaṇam akālajñaptiṃ dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1216: sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1222: tasya tatra jihvendriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni ayomayāni nikhātāni bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1223: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatāgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālānukālaṃ dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1226: sa tenākuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrāsyopapattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1228: sa udvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1229: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇāpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1230: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ veti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1232: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1235: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1238: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣākārān patrākārān phalākārān te 'pi bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1239: tair api sāṃghikāni vṛkṣapatrapus.paphalāni paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktāni tena te vṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphalākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1240: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣī rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1241: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjanyākārāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1242: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭākāraṃ sa śrāmaṇeraka āsīt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1245: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1247: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1248: te vṛttā veleti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ prakrāntāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1249: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukākāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1250: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalākāraṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1253: sa tenoktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitveti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1255: sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā dāsyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1257: śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evāham udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1261: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam āpatsyatīti tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1265: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1268: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat kṛtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1272: apy eva nāma etat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1273: tenātyayam atyayato na deśitaṃ tena karmaṇodūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1276: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1277: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryābhibhūtena lābhaḥ saṃparivartitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1279: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1280: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1286: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrddhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1289: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhābhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1292: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatīyaṃ dvitīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1293: yaḥ punar mām uddiśya śirastuṇḍamuṇḍakāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ śikṣādhārī vā śikṣādhārī vā tasya duḥśīlasya vā śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1294: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati jīvitena vā viyojayatīyaṃ tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1295_0: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1295_1: vā jīvitād vyaparopayati samagraṃ vā saṃghaṃ bhinatti tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
SA11sanssr_pu:1296: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarānyataraṃ karmotpādayatīyaṃ caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1298: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayatīyaṃ pañcamī mūlāpattiḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1299: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotīyaṃ mūlāpattiḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1300: ādikarmiṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vāṣṭau mūlāpattayo /
SA11sanssr_pu:1301: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1302: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1304: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunāsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1305: te ca parīttabuddhayo 'pi kulaputrā annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1306: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1307: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1308: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1309: te saṃtrāsena vivarttayanty annuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1311: yayā mūlāpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1314: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1316: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva vakṣyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:1317: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1318: na tvaṃ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1319: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1321: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvidyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1322: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1324: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva /
SA11sanssr_pu:1326: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1327: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1328: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatva evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1330: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
SA11sanssr_pu:1332: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /
SA11sanssr_pu:1333: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśāntaṃ kartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1335: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ copadiśata /
SA11sanssr_pu:1338: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantīdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam upagṛhṇīyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1339: ubhayor api mūlāpatir bhavatīyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya caturthī mūlāpattiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1340: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā nidarśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1341: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārthaṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti svādhyāyanti dhārayanti vācayanti deśayanti pareṣāṃ ca śrutamātram upadiśanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1344: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ cāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1346: atas te īrṣyahetunā cottarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1347: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayāpāyagāmino bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1348: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatraiva maraṇaṃ nigacched /
SA11sanssr_pu:1349: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram avatartukāmā īrṣyāhetos tad vadanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1350: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1351: evaṃ te bālā ādikarmikā bodhisatvā īrṣyāhetor annṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1353_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani gṛhasthapravrajitā ādikarmikā
SA11sanssr_pu:1353_2: kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrāntān dhārayanti paṭhanti svādhyāyanti
SA11sanssr_pu:1354: ahaṃ cemān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvaivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavopadiśāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1355: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu pratyakṣo bhaviṣyasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1356: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama /
SA11sanssr_pu:1357: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇāham imān evaṃrūpān dharmān gambhīragambhīrān upadiśāmi na sākṣātkriyayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1359: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sāparādhiko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1365: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahāṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ kṣuttarṣaprapīḍitaḥ sa tatra mahāphalavṛkṣe pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1366: āhārārthaṃ sa udāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam annāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni bhuñjīta bhuktvā ca kālaṃ kuryāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1368_0: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya mahāyānam avatartukāmā
SA11sanssr_pu:1368_1: lābhasatkārayaśohetor ātmānam upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām
SA11sanssr_pu:1368_2: āpattim āpadyante yayā gurukayāpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1369: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ sarvakṣatriyabrāhmaṇaviṭśūdrāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1370: yaś ca tān sevate sa sātisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1372: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālā amātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1373: bahuvidheṣu dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuṣu saṃdṛśyante te tyāgamadamattā mānamadadarpeṇa kṣatriyaṃ vibhedayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1377: tenopadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya teṣāṃ prāhṛtaṃ pradāpyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1380: ye kṣatriyacaṇḍālāḥ śramaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ praduṣyanti tathārūpaṃ ca te dharmaṃ prajñapayiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1383: mahākaruṇānetrīprajñāpāramitaśikṣopāyakauśalyaśikṣāḥ yāś cāpareṣu sūtreṣu śikṣā upadiṣṭās tā apahāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1384: tathārūpāṃ dharmayuktiṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ viheṭhanārthapūrvakaṃ kriyākāraṃ prajñapayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1388: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nopaśamyanti na tanūbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1389: tatkāle punas te bhikṣava āśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1390: ācāravipannā bhavanti dṛṣṭivipannā bhavanti taddhetoḥ śaithilikā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1394: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti mānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1395: te ca prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1396: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antike praduṣyati avadhyāyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1397: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svādhyāyābhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1408: yadi te bodhisatvā ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā darśanam asyākāṅkṣeran /
SA11sanssr_pu:1410_0: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaḥkuryuḥ nāma cāsya parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa
SA11sanssr_pu:1410_1: kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇāgratas tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ sthāsyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1411: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya yathā samutthitās tā āpattīḥ pratideśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1414: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1416: tenādikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sāparādhena paścime yāme utthāyāsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1419: aruṇa aruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahoditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe māṃ karuṇayāchādayasva /
SA11sanssr_pu:1420: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1421: mama svapnāntare tam upāyam upadarśaya yenāham upāyenāpattiṃ pratideśayāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1423: tena tatkālaṃ śayyāyāṃ nidrāpayitavyaṃ sahodgate 'ruṇe iha jambudvīpe ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasyeha samāgamo bhavati svarūpeṇa ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1424: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya svapnāntare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlāpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānopāyena /
SA11sanssr_pu:1426: yenopāyakauśalyena sa ādikarmiko bodhisatvas tatraiva bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sudṛḍhavyavasthitaś ca bhavati mahāyānae ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1427: atha vā yo 'tra sūtre 'dhyeṣaṇamantraḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1430: araṇye upavane 'bhyavakāśe vāgaraṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālānusāri vā dhūpayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1431: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditvā ime mantrapadāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1440: murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika sarvāśāṃ me sthāpaya /
SA11sanssr_pu:1448: yadi kṣatriyādayo 'pi bodhisatvāḥ katham eṣām āpattiniyamo 'nyeṣāṃ cādhikyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1451: kathaṃ vā taddoṣāt sāmvarikā api gṛhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:1453: yeṣāṃ yatra bahulaṃ saṃbhavaḥ te tatrākoṭitāḥ svanāmagrahaṇadarśanād bhayotpādanārthaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1454: paraḥparatas tu sarvaiḥ sarvā āpattayaḥ parihartavyāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1455: yena vā prakṛtimahāsāvadyatayāsamādāno 'py abhavyo bhavaty ucchinnakuśalamūlaś ca sutarāṃ tena sāmvarikā ity alam anayā cintayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:1457: kiṃ vāpi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ kalpaśatasahasram api mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1459: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair vihared iyaṃ bodhisatvasya gurukā mūlāpattiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1460: tad yathā kulaputra śrāvakayānīyo mūlāpattim āpannaḥ so 'bhavyas tair eva skandhaiḥ parinirvātum /
SA11sanssr_pu:1461: evam eva kulaputro 'pratideśyaitām āpattim aniḥsṛjya tān śrāvakapratyekabuddhamanasikārān abhavyo buddhabhūmau parinirvātum iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1462: āsāṃ ca mūlāpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇadhāraṇārtham ekīyamatānāṃ ca saṃgrahakārikā ucyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:1476: daṇḍāpayed vā śramaṇān dadyād vā śaraṇatrayāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:1477: gṛhṇīyād dīyamānaṃ vā śamathe tyājanāt punaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1486: yo mahābrahman mamoddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur anubhūtaḥ kaśambakajāto 'śramaṇaḥ śramaṇapratijñaḥ abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijñaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1488: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur adyāpi sarvadevānāṃ yāvat sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvat puṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1489_0: kiṃ cāpi sa apātrībhūtaḥ tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena kāṣāyavastraprāvaraṇeryāpathena
SA11sanssr_pu:1489_1: darśanahetunāpi bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ vividhakuśalamūlopastambhanakaraḥ sugatimārgadarśako bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1490_0: tasmād yo mamoddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā tasya nānujānāmi cakravarttir
SA11sanssr_pu:1490_1: ājñām api yan mamoddiśya pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇāpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1491: aṅgam aṅgaṃ vikarttanaṃ vā kartuṃ jīvitād vā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1494: atha ca punaḥ sa pudgalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśa iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1496: ye mamoddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā viheṭhayiṣyanti te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānām atīva sāparādhā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1499: sarvabuddhair adhiṣṭhito 'yaṃ mokṣadhvajo yad uta raktakāṣāyavastram iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1501: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca bodhisatvaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1502_0: vayam api bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān
SA11sanssr_pu:1502_1: pātrabhūtāṃś ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudgalāñ jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto
SA11sanssr_pu:1503: tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena triṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1507: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān vacanais tarjitavantaḥ paribhāṣitavantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1509: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān apātrabhūtān patrābhūtāṃś ca praharitavantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1515: vayaṃ bhagavantam uddiśya pravrajitān gṛhasthān kāritavantaḥ tata asthānaṃ sāditāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1517_0: asmābhir bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakā apatrabhūtāḥ pātrabhūtāś ca sāparādhikāś
SA11sanssr_pu:1517_1: cārake prakṣiptās tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃs tṛṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:1518: tad vayam etarhi karmāvaraṇaśeṣāṃ bhagavato 'ntike pratideśayāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1521: uddharatu bhagavān asmān annantapāpebhya iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:1523: caturbhir mahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1524: jātyandhaś ca jaḍaś cājihvakaś ca caṇḍālaś ca jātu sukhito bhavaty abhyākhyānabahulaś ca ṣaṇḍakaś ca paṇḍakaś ca nityadāsaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1525: strī ca bhavati śvā ca śūkaraś ca gardabhaś coṣṭraś ca āśīviṣaś ca bhavati tatra tatra jātau //
SA11sanssr_pu:1527: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakrṭādhikārāṇāṃ satvānāṃ naiṣkramyacittasya pravrajyācittasyāryamārgacittasyāntarāyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1529: punar aparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākam aśraddadhat putrasya vā duhitur vā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyaiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyāntarāyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1538: tad yathāgniśikhācarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye 'gniśikṣāmadhyagatā na dahyante saṃhṛṣṭatarāś ca nārakeyāṇāṃ kapālaṃ bhittvā rudhiraṃ pibanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1539: kapālāntaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā jvalitamastakaluṅgān pibanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1540: jihvāmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidāryābhito 'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1541: sāpi jihvā bhuktā punar api saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1542: evam arthānurūpasaṃjñā dantotpāṭakā nāma kaṇṭhanāḍyapakarṣakā nāma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1548: marmaguhyakā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti krandamānānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1549: sūcīchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1552: keśoṇḍukā nāma pakṣiṇo ye keśamūlāny utpāṭayanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1553: sa evam avīcipradeśas trīṇi yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pakṣibhairavapakṣo nāma /
SA11sanssr_pu:1554: tatra tair anyair nārakeyaiḥ sahānnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bhakṣyate saṃbhavati ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1555: sa kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ sarvasmād duṣkhajālaparivṛtaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1556: śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśas tatra gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1557_0: trāṇānveṣī śaraṇānveṣī paritrāṇānveṣī samantata ekādaśabhir arciskandhair āvṛto niḥsahāyaḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:1557_1: karmapāśabandhanabaddhaḥ samantataḥ śatrubhir āvṛtaḥ kāntāram anuprapannaḥ sarvasmān
SA11sanssr_pu:1557_2: narakapuñjād adhikataraṃ vyasanam abhiprapannas taṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1560: sukumārataraḥ ślakṣṇataraḥ kharābhis tīvrābhir vedanābhir abhibhūtaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1561: tasyaivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvāṅgapratyaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1562: sa tasmin deśe nipatati patitaḥ śvabhre prapatati trīṇi yojanasahasrāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:1565: yāvat tasyaivam utkṣipyamānasya ca prapatataś cānnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1566: kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ paribhrāmitaś cakrāṅkaṃ vivaraṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1567: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe sahasrārāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhavanti vajranābhīni tīkṣṇajvālāni śīghrabhramāṇi tasya sahagamanād eva tāni cakrāṇi śarīraṃ prāpya bhramanti / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1568: pratyekaṃ sarvāṅgāni pramathnanto dahanti pādatale cāsya śaṅkubhir bhidyete /
SA11sanssr_pu:1571: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1576: sa eṣa duṣkṛtakarmāntacārī ālātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahad arthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1579: sa evaṃ mohitaḥ pāpakārī prajvalitāṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā taddraviṇam anudhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1580: sa karmakṛtair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate śastrajālamadhyagataḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaḥ pāṭyate viśasyate dahyate 'sthyavaśeṣaḥ kriyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1581: na cāsyānnādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhas tām apy avasthāṃ gatasya parihīyatae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1583: eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1584: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena pūrvaṃ naṣṭasmṛtinā dṛṣṭā /
SA11sanssr_pu:1586: sa tena dhāvati yena tā striyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1589: gṛhītvā cauṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathāsya sarṣapaphalamātrapramāṇam api nāvaśiṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1593: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgāgner na nivartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1594: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1595: na cāsya tatpīḍā tathā bādhate yathā rāgāgniḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1596: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayāyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālākulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1599: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutas teṣāṃ bhavet sukham // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:1600: yāvat / strī vināśo vināśānām iha loke paratra ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:1601: tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syur yadīcchet sukham ātmana iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:1603: sa tair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate gṛhītvā ca tanmukhaṃ vidārayanti tasmāj jihvām apakarṣayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1604: sā ca jihvā karmavaśāt pañcayojanaśatapramāṇā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1605: tasya mṛṣāvādasya balena tasyāś ca sahanirgamanakāle te yamapuruṣā bhūmāv ānāhayanti pradīptāyomayyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1606: karmakṛtaṃ ca halasahasraṃ prādurbhavati pradīptāgrasaṃyuktaṃ balavadbhir balīvardais tad asyāntargataṃ jihvāyāṃ vahati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1608: sā ca jihvā tathā sukumārā yathā devānām akṣi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1609: yāvat sa vedanātas tanati krandati vikrośati na cāsya tadduḥkhaṃ kaścid apanayatīti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1610: tasyaivaṃ pracaṇḍām vedanām anubhavato 'nnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi sā ca jihvā kṛṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1611: sā kathañcit tasya nārakasya mukhe praviśati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1612: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate 'ṅgārakarṣūṣu dahyamāno nimajjan /
SA11sanssr_pu:1613: tasyaivaṃ duḥkhārttasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya punar api yamapuruṣāḥ prādurbhavanti mudgarāsipāṇayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:1614: te taṃ puruṣaṃ mastakāt prabhṛti yāvat pādau cūrṇayantīty ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1615: paiśunyavipākas tu yathaiva mṛṣāvādasya trīṇi yojanaśatāni jihveti viśeṣas tu /
SA11sanssr_pu:1616: tāṃ yamapuruṣā nistriṃśān ādāya pradīptadhārān jihvāṃ nikṛntanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1618: paramakaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ prativedayate sa krandati vikrośaty avyaktākṣaraṃ jihvāvirahita ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:1620: te tāṃ jihvām āsyaṃ vidārya gṛhṇanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1621: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiś chittvā tasya bhūya eva khādanīyārthena mukhe prakṣipanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:1622: sa ca jighansārditaḥ kṣutkṣāmavadanaḥ svarudhiralālāparisrutāṃ tām eva svajihvāṃ bhakṣayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:1623: sā ca jihvā chinnā punar api saṃjāyate karmavaśāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:1624: atha sa bhūmau vedanārttaḥ parivartate viceṣṭate krandate /
SA11sanssr_pu:1625: tasyaivaṃ vedanārttasya parivṛttanayanatārakasya duṣkhārttasya dīnasyāsahāyasyaikākinaḥ svakṛtam upabhuñjānasya yamapuruṣā anuśāsanīgāthāṃ bhāṣante //

SA11sanssr_pu:2321: ādikarmikeṇa maitreya bodhisatvena prajñābalādhānaprāptena lābhasatkāraparivarjitena lābhasatkāradoṣadarśinā bhavitavyaṃ // pe //

SA11sanssr_pu:2507: suparīttaprajñās te bhagavan bodhisatvā bhaviṣyanti vihīnaprajñā ye 'gradharmān varjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇy ārapsyante //

SA11sanssr_pu:3094: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3095: vicikitsā naiva kartavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyati dhruvam / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3096: bodhicittadṛḍhatā cātra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamārtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya //
SA11sanssr_pu:3101: tathā kuto mamālpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3102: na cātikrāntadurgater utsāhormibahulasyopacitāprameyapuṇyaskandhasya bhūmipraviṣṭasyāyaṃ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3103: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nādhikākṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3106: kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvotsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyāvicārataḥ pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihaiva yatheṣṭasiddhiś ca bhavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:3118: namo 'stu te agrograśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrottame svāhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3121: bhojanapānaśayanāsanavasanapūjopakaraṇāni cābhimantritena jalena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā rakṣeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3130: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭābhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya //
SA11sanssr_pu:3152: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3154: yaś cainaṃ ahir daśati saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrddhā arjakasyeva mañjarī //
SA11sanssr_pu:3155: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ dhārayati sa yāvajjīvam ahinā na daśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3157: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni yatkāraṇaṃ sarpo mriyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3185: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathāvitathānanyathābhūtaṃ satyam aviparītam aviparyastaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3213: rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopāye sopasargebhyaḥ svāhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3225: imām api vidyām annantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ vidyādharapiṭakopanibaddhāṃ sarvabhayarakṣārthaṃ prayuñjīta //
SA11sanssr_pu:3238: namo sabbasammasaṃbuddhāṇaṃ sijjhantu me mantapadāḥ svāhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3243: tatra yadi vismṛtya paradravyam ātmabharaṇatṛṣṇayā paribhuṅkte kliṣṭāpattim āpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3244: atha vitṛṣṇo 'nyāsakto vā satvakāryam anusmṛtya bhuṅkte na kliṣṭām āpattim āpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3247: satvasvāmikais tu bhogaiḥ satvasvāmika evātmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣata ity adoṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3248: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyam asti yena varteta //
SA11sanssr_pu:3251: na caikāntasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam annanujñāpyāpi bhuñjānasya kaścid doṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3252: nāpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyāntike kasyacid viditavṛttāntasyāpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittāparijñānāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3253: na cātra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3254: sarvotsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhoktyā pratipāditaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3256: tasya spaṣṭāvabodhārtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svārthāpekṣayeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3259: bhogapuṇyarakṣā saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ evaṃ tāvad ātmabhāvarakṣā veditavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3261: tatra sukṛtārambhiṇā bhāvyaṃ mātrajñena ca sarvata iti śikṣāpadād asya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā //
SA11sanssr_pu:3269: alpādhamabhogenāpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayam anyair vā bahūttamabhoganāśanopekṣā na kāryeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3273: adhikasatvārthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisatvasyādhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3275: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktas tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3279: yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:3280: yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatva ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3281: na śāriputra tathāgatena pravrajitasyāmiṣadānam anujñātaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3282: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3284: sacet punaḥ kaścid evāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta /
SA11sanssr_pu:3287: sacet punas tasyonaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmacaryavāsaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3291: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhaven na tenālpecchatā āsevitā bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3292: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tena dharma āsevitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3294: anyathā hy ekasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ satvarāśes tasya ca satvasya bodhisatvāśayaparikarmāntarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād /
SA11sanssr_pu:3299: yo 'yaṃ vidhir ātmany uktaḥ so 'nyasminn api bodhisatve pratipādya iti kuto gamyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3314: tathā ca dharmasaṅgītau sārthavāho bodhisatva āha /
SA11sanssr_pu:3315: yo bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhim icchati nātmanaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3318: kiṃ tu satvārthahānibhayād ayogye satve subharaṃ nāropayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3319: yatra tu satvārthahāniṃ na paśyati tatra svayaṃ kṛtam anyena vā jagad dhitam ācaritam iti ko viśeṣo /
SA11sanssr_pu:3320: yad ayam aparabodhisatvakuśalasiddhaye na svakuśalam utsṛjati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3323: atha tadduṣkhena me bādhā nāstīty upekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3326: catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisatvapratirūpakā ity ārabhyoktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3328: tasmād ugraparipṛcchāvidhinā pūrvavad ātmā garhaṇīyaḥ eṣā tu bodhisatvaśikṣā yathāryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṅgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3335: yan maitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3339: yat kāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayanti na ca pratikāraṃ kāṅkṣanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3342: yat pūrvataraṃ satvānāṃ bodhim icchanti nātmana iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3347: yena dātur mahādakṣiṇīye mahārthadānān mahāpuṇyasāgaravistaro dṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3348: anyathā tu kevalam eva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:3350: ya eṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahasreṇa parivyayo 'tra praviṣṭaḥ sa sarvaḥ piṇḍīkṛtyaikasya bhikṣor yātrā bhaved evaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3351: yaś coddeśasvādhyāyābhiyukto bodhisatvaḥ sagauravo dharmakamaḥ śraddhādeyam āhāraṃ parigṛhyaivaṃ cittam utpādayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3353: asya kuśalasyaiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaitīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3365: na rūpahetor na varṇahetor na yaśohetoḥ / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3370: sa evaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisatvo daśabhir dharmair na hīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3373: tatra ca bhavaty apramatto bodhipratikāṅkṣī buddhadarśanam abhikāṅkṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3374: evaṃ brahmatvād buddhadarśanābhedyapratilambhād dharmaśravaṇān na parihīyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3377: evaṃ śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaḥkṛto bhavati devaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3380: sadā pūjito bhavati gandharvaiḥ sadāpacāyitaś ca bhavati nāgendrāsurendraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3384: śāstṛsaṃmataś ca bhavati sadevakasya lokasyānukampakaś ca bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:3387: yad utākṣaṇagatiṃ na gacchaty anyatra satvaparipākāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3391: evaṃ pūrvotsṛṣṭasyāpi puṇyasya kleśavaśāt punar upādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3392: puṇyadānād api yat puṇyaṃ tato 'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo 'nyatra parārthāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:3396: dattvā ca na vipratisāracittam utpādayitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3398: vipratisārāt pāpavat puṇyasyāpi kṣayaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3403: pāpasya daurmanasyenaiva puṇyasya saumanasyenāpattiḥ satvārthaṃ nirāmiṣacittasya prakāśayataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3404: yathā ratnameghe vaidyadṛṣṭāntena ātmotkarṣo nirdoṣa uktaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3405: punaḥ puṇyarakṣā kāmo lābhasatkārabhītaḥ syād unnatiṃ varjayet sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3406: bodhisatvo prasannaḥ syād dharme vimatim utsṛjet //
SA11sanssr_pu:3408: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasyotpannotpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:3409: yaiḥ caturbhir muktāḥ na vardhante kuśaladharmaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3416: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvāṅgena praṇipatya cittam abhiprasādayantam /
SA11sanssr_pu:3418: anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntādharaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3419: atrāntare yāvantyā vālikās tāvanty anena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:3420: yāvad athāyuṣmān upālir yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:3421: yad uktaṃ bhagavatāsya bhikṣor evaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:3422: kutremāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3423: nāham upāle evaṃ kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:3425: atropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3426: tasmāt tarhy upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yad dagdhasthūṇāyām api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3429: pratighaḥ pratigha iti kalpaśatopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ pratihanti tenocyate pratigha iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3430: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasatvaparitrāṇy ojasaḥ striyā rātridevatayā pūrvāvadānaṃ kathayantyābhihitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3432: varṇād api balād api parihīyante smeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3433: atra ca na kadācid unnatiḥ kāryeti pradarśanārthaṃ sadety ucyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3436: iha kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ sumerumātram api ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3441: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhāvaṣṭabdā iva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3442: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:3446: yathā duṣkhitānāṃ ca sarvasatvānām upajīvyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3451: yadi punar asya taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati tatra nonnāmajāto bhavati na mānajāto na madajātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3453: na cireṇa kālena yasya cāyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthito yaiś ca samutthāpito yaś ca kīrtiśabdaślokas trayam apy etat sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3454: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo 'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣv adhruveṣv annāśvāsikeṣv anunayacittam utpādayed unnato bhaven mānadarpito vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3455: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo lābhasatkārakīrtiśabdaślokeṣu sūpasthitasmṛtir viharatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3456: punar āha / caṇḍālakumāropamāś ca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:3457: mānamadadarpādhigatāś ca bhavanti paiśunyasaṃjñāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitatvād iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3459: iha kulaputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhavāsaḥ pravrajito bodhisatvo mṛtakasadṛśo 'haṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānām iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3460: vairūpyaṃ me 'bhyudgataṃ vivarṇāni ca me vāsāṃsi prāvṛtāny anyaś ca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛtta iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3461: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulāt kulam upasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetor bhikṣānidānam iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3462: nīcanīcena cittena caṇḍālakumārasadṛśena piṇḍāya carāmīti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3464: parapratibaddhā ca me jīviketi nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3466: ārādhanīyā me ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyā iti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3468: yad uta tena tenācāragocarasamudācāreṇeti nihatamāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3470: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ satvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmīti nihatamāno bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3476: sa kiyad dhīnānām api satvānāṃ rūpavikalānām apy avanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatām upādāyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3478: syād yathāpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3479: tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3480: evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyālpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śrotendriyasyābhāsam āgacchanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3482: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan yo bodhisatvo mānonnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ na ca gurudakṣiṇīyebhyo 'vanamati na praṇamati veditavyaṃ bhagavan mārāṅkuśāviddho vatāyaṃ bodhisatva iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:3487: dharmabhāṇakānāṃ viśiṣṭadharmādhigatānām udāradharmadeśakānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ nirvāṇapathavidhijñānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrāntarājapratilabdhānāṃ nāvanamati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3491: mārakarma dharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇae udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ na prayacchati mā kaścid asmin praśaṃsatīti mārakarma //
SA11sanssr_pu:3496: adhimānaṃ cotpādyājānann abudhyamāno varṇārhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3498: na ca parasya guṇavarṇenāttamanā bhavati / mārakarma //
SA11sanssr_pu:3499: jānāti ca / ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinayo bhūtam idaṃ buddhavacanam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:3506: vṛddhasthavirāṇāṃ ciracaritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ na pratyupatiṣṭhate na ca pratyudgacchati / mārakarma //
SA11sanssr_pu:3518: kiṃ kuśalaṃ kim akuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3528: sa evaṃ dharmavihārī sthānam etad vidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet /
SA11sanssr_pu:3529: atha ca punar bodhicittabalādhīnād aiśvaryaṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3534: yāni parivarjya bodhisatvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:3546: satvakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataś ca buddhakṣetrād buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāgamo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3549: sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca satvān niśritya pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:3553: iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ ādita eva sarvasatvānām antike daśaprakāraṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:3556: hitacittatāṃ sukhacittatāṃ dāyācittatāṃ snigdhacittatāṃ priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:3560: parāṃś ca sarvasatvaśiṣyatvābhyupagame pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīty āśvāsaṃ pratilabhate //
SA11sanssr_pu:3566: lokaprasādānurakṣārthaṃ tv āsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatāpi cetasā strīṣu vākṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisatvena premagauravābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:3567: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhāsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito 'bhūt /
