SA11sanssr_pu:4184: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahārakakaivartakarṣakādīnāṃ duṣkhābhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇāṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4186: tathā prākṛtā api kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenaiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanā api saṃgrāmayanty eva /
SA11sanssr_pu:4187_0: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālāpakāriṣu duṣkhopāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nāvadhyaghātakeṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4187_2: annavadhikalpābaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:4192: tathā sarvaduṣkhotpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānābhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4193: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate //
SA11sanssr_pu:4196: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvārambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4198: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4199: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4200: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyārddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate bandhanāgāreṣv api praks.iptasya // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4203: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4204: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4205: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4206: akṣiṇyutpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vāghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4210: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ carata etat praṇidhānam abhūt /
SA11sanssr_pu:4213: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4214: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇāchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4216: sa ebhir manaḥkāraiḥ samanvāgata etena karmaṇā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4217: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvānugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4218: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4219: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhākrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye akṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4226: saumyāya dṛṣṭīya sadā sthito bhaved / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4231: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyaudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasa utplavaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4269: iti hi yā sarvendriyeṣv annavalīnendriyatā iyam ucyate muditety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:4270: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe /
SA11sanssr_pu:4271: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4272: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayāgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ bhavantīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4276: annāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārādhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato /
SA11sanssr_pu:4284: sa evam adhyāśayasaṃpanna eva samānaḥ sarvasatvānām antikād uccaghanāṃ sahate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4285: unmananāṃ kutsanāṃ sahate sarvasatvānām ākrośaparibhāṣāṃ duruktadurāgatān vacanapathān sahate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4287: sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4302: ... sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4303_0: yatraiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam
SA11sanssr_pu:4303_1: utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ votpādayiṣyati
SA11sanssr_pu:4303_2: tatrāsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas /
SA11sanssr_pu:4304_0: te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:4304_1: paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samuccareyur adhiṣṭhitā annarthakarmāṇaḥ śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4304_2: mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4305: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyāntike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4307_0: pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyāpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyāpi tiryagyonigatasyāpi
SA11sanssr_pu:4307_1: yamalokagatasyāpi manuṣyagatasyāpi kāmāhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamājīvagocarasya
SA11sanssr_pu:4307_2: nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā chinno bhinno nikṛtto vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:4307_3: kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmārthaṃ kṛto na parārthaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4308: sacet punar punar mamaite sarvasatvā aparāntakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathāpi mayāparityaktaiva sarvajñatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4313: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4315: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvārambaṇā mahākaruṇā // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4321: evaṃ dharmagaṇanāviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4324: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4327: yat kāye chidyamāne ya evāsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣārthaṃ kṣamate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4328: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ copadarśayatīyam asya kṣāntipāramitā //
SA11sanssr_pu:4329: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ notsṛjati cittabalādhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4333: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittotpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati bodhim evāpekṣate śāntapraśāntam eva pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4335: yat kāye chidyamāne kāyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavatpratibhāsopamatāṃ pratyavekṣate māyādharmatāṃ ca kāyasyāvatarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4336: bhūtānityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtānātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyopanidhyāyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4343: eṣa eva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4345: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām annupaśāntānām arthāya saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4348: sa parigaveṣamāṇo na taṃ dharmam upalabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4355: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4356: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe /
SA11sanssr_pu:4360: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4361: pareṣām antike na mamaitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjanayeyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:4362: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣāntaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye /
SA11sanssr_pu:4364: na mayāśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhopadhānena sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tatra nāmāhaṃ vyāpadye /
SA11sanssr_pu:4365: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4369: na mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4372: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4380: kiyadbahū dharmaparyāyuṇeyā [doubtful] śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrute namanta /
SA11sanssr_pu:4381: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu trāyituṃ duḥśīlayena vrajamāna durgatim //
SA11sanssr_pu:4383: tathā hi kulaputrāḥ śrutavataḥ prajñāgamo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4386: atra ca maharṣer uttarasya jātakaṃ vistareṇa kṛtvāha /
SA11sanssr_pu:4389: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ sapratīśānāṃ anyalokadhātusthitā api buddhā bhagavanto mukham upadarśayanti dharmaṃ cānuśrāvayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4394: dharmakāmānāṃ vimalatejaḥ bodhisatvānāṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā buddhapratibhānam upasaṃharanti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4395: parikṣīṇāyuṣkāṇāṃ buddhā bhagavanto devatāś cāyurbalaṃ copasaṃharanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4396: buddhādhiṣṭhānena devatādhiṣṭhānena ca kāṅkṣāmāṇā varṣasahasram avatiṣṭhante // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4397: yāvat kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā yāvad vā ākāṅkṣanti dharmagauravajātānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto jarām apy apanayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4406: tasmāt tarhi vimalatejaḥ śrutasaṃbhārakauśalyābhiyuktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4411_0: chandākāram āśayākāram adhyāśayākāraṃ prayogākāraṃ nirmāṇākāram apramāṇākāraṃ kalyāṇamitrākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4411_1: gauravākāraṃ pradakṣiṇākāraṃ suvacanākāraṃ paryupāsanākāram avahitaśrotrākāraṃ manaḥkārākāram
SA11sanssr_pu:4411_3: smṛtibhajanākāraṃ gatibodhanākāraṃ matirocanākāraṃ buddhipraveśāk āram atṛptabuddhadharmaśravaṇākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4411_10: pratītyasamutpādākāraṃ anityākāraṃ duṣkhākāram annātmākāraṃ śāntākāraṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākāraṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4413: yaś ca dharmasaṃbhārayogaḥ sa evāsya jñānasaṃbhāro bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4414: tatra katamo dharmasaṃbhārayogo yeyam alpārthatālpakṛtyatālpabhāṣatālpapariṣkāratā pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya śrutārthaparitulanatā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4448: lokāyataśāstrāṇi daṇḍanītiśāstrāṇi kārkhedaśāstrāṇi vādavidyāśāstrāṇi kumārakrīḍāśāstrāṇi jambhakavidyāśāstrāṇi // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4449: yāny api tad anyāni kānicin mokṣapratikūlāni śāstrāṇi saṃmohāya saṃvartante tāni sarvāṇi bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena parivarjayitavyānīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4450: evaṃ śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4451: kathaṃ punar āśayasaṃpannasyāpy ugradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛham anujñātaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4454: na teṣām asāmarthye 'pi prakṛtiduṣṭatvād gṛhāvāsasya ca prajñaptisāvadyatvād iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4458: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4460: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4461: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam annuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim //
SA11sanssr_pu:4462: ye kāma varjenti yathāgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4463: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4464: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇa āsīd annāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4465: yehi sthitair eva agāramadhye prāptā iyaṃ uttama agrabodhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4466: prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4467: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4468: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4469: nopasthitā bhonti narottamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān //
SA11sanssr_pu:4470: yaś caiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvārtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4471: araṇyābhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4472: yadi punar visabhāgasatvānunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhādikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta /
SA11sanssr_pu:4474: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4475: mamāntike ceti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam //
SA11sanssr_pu:4476: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:4477: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4478: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:4479: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4480: sahadhārmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:4481: prāviṣkaronti imi bāladharmā imam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4482: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhya sārddham /
SA11sanssr_pu:4483: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4485: sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyāpriya nāsti kahiṃcit /
SA11sanssr_pu:4486: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4489: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yatheva vrajanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4490: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:4491: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriya vidyati saṃgo //
SA11sanssr_pu:4492: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo /
SA11sanssr_pu:4493: anta ubhe api tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme //
SA11sanssr_pu:4495: bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4496: na vivadati kadāci yuktayogī imi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
SA11sanssr_pu:4497: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:4498: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4499: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sada upaśāntarato vivekacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4500: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
SA11sanssr_pu:4501: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām /
SA11sanssr_pu:4502: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'sya imi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve //
SA11sanssr_pu:4503: punar āha / vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
SA11sanssr_pu:4504: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4507: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntendriyāḥ sūratāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4508: na strīsaṃbhava naiva cāpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4510: lābhair nāpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:4513: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayaikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānīty ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:4514: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhādau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sa evaikaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4517: tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatā udakārṇavenohyamāna udakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryād /
SA11sanssr_pu:4518: evam eva kāśyapa ihaike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4525: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nātidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati nātisaṃnikṛṣṭe /
SA11sanssr_pu:4526_0: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpāyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yāni
SA11sanssr_pu:4526_1: ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny
SA11sanssr_pu:4527_0: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya
SA11sanssr_pu:4527_1: svādhyāyati nātyuccena svareṇa nātinīcena noddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena
SA11sanssr_pu:4527_2: prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
SA11sanssr_pu:4528: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vopasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vānye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4535: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4537: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntendriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanā upasaṃhartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4540: sacet saṃvegānukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārodārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:4541: brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadānām apy upasaṃkrāmatāṃ yathānurūpāḥ kriyā upasaṃhartavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4542: sa evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4543: te ca satvās tasyāntike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4545: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye prativasatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /

SA11sanssr_pu:4553: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /

SA11sanssr_pu:4572: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4573: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhata utpadyante // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4574_0: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nātmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nātmābhiniveśaṃ nātmaparigrahaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4574_1: nātmanidānaṃ nātmatṛṣṇāṃ nātmasaṃjñāṃ nātmavādopādānaṃ nātmadṛṣṭiṃ nātmādhiṣṭhānaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4576: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nāsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso /
SA11sanssr_pu:4578: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4579: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati nottrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:4580: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4584: tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ yoniśaḥ kāya upaparīkṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4585: nāsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4586: abhūtaparikalpa eṣa yad uta bhayaṃ nāma /
SA11sanssr_pu:4588: tena yathāraṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanti amamā aparigrahāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4589: evam evāmamenāparigraheṇāraṇyam eva sarvadharmā iti jñātvā upasampadya vihartavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4592: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhānujñāto 'raṇyavāsa iti jñātvāraṇye vastavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4594: upastabdhakuśalamūlaḥ paścādgrāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv avatīrya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4595: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatva uddeśasvādhyāyārthaṃ gaṇam avatarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4596_0: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenācāryopādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4596_1: bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam annalasena svayaṃkāriṇāparopatāpinā na ca tenopasthānagurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4598: tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4599: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4601: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4602: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4604: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmānugraho naśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4605: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4608_0: sacet punar gṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisatvo dharmaśravaṇārthika ācāryopādhyāyadarśanārthiko
SA11sanssr_pu:4608_1: vā glānaparipṛcchako vā grāmāntikaṃ śayanāsanam āgacchet tena sāyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya
SA11sanssr_pu:4609: sacet punar asya parapratibaddha uddeśaḥ svādhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatāraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4610: eṣa eva tasyāraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā cātṛpteti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4612: yadi punar asya tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgā āgaccheyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4613: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsa utpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4618: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4619: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran /
SA11sanssr_pu:4621: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4622: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayāmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4623: yadi punas tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'manuṣyā upasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4625: yadi pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā āraṇyakaṃ bhikṣum upasaṃkramya praśnaṃ paripṛccheyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4626: tatra tenāraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmādhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ dharmo deśayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4627: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sa āraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4628: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyāśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4630: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadādhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4633: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4635: yathaiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:4638: evam evāyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsopamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyā utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4640: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramārthata utpadyate vā nirudhyate veti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4642: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane viharatā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4643: yady apy aham araṇyam āgata eko 'dvitīyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:4644: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:4645: api tu khalu punaḥ santīme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittāśayaṃ jānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4647: so 'ham ihāraṇyāyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:4648: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgata eko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ kāmavitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4649: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vākuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4651: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nnabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4655: tad evam araṇye vasan samādhānāya yujyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:4657: sa teṣām eva satvānām arthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carann avikṣiptacitto bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4660: laukikī dhyānopapattir api tāvad vikṣiptacittasya durlabhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4665: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:4666: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4667: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya viharato 'bhidhyādaurmanasye anye vā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4674: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4676: yato 'dhikaraṇam asya mana indriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtasya pāpakāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4679: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi samāhitāvasthām asamāhitāvasthāṃ na vijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4684: rahasy arahasi vā kalpiteryāpathaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4702: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān asaṃbhūtān aniṣpannān annabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyatīti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4703: tatra līne manasi muditā bhāvanayottejanaṃ kuryāt /

SA11sanssr_pu:4707: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyajati pramādaṃ yadi moktukāma / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4708: tathā / mayopamaṃ vitatham etat svapnopamaṃ ca saṃskṛtam avekṣya na cirād bhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4710: udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:4711: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvan na budhyathā pravarabodhim / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4713: jvalitaṃ tribhuvaṃ jaravyādhidukhair maraṇāgnipradīptam anātham idam /
SA11sanssr_pu:4714: bhavaniḥśaraṇe sada mūḍha jagad bhramati bhramaro yathā kumbhagataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4715: adhruvaṃ tribhuvaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4716: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4718: parivarttiṣu pañcagatiṣv abudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakra bhramī //
SA11sanssr_pu:4720: pariṣiktam idaṃ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathaiva kapi //
SA11sanssr_pu:4721: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokopadrava kāmaguṇāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4724: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayāḥ saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4725: yatha agnikhadāḥ jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāma ime viditāryajanaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4727: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāma ime viditā viduṣām /
SA11sanssr_pu:4728: tatha śūlasāmā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃ kiśavaira tathodakacandranibhā imi kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimba ivā girighoṣa yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4730: kṣaṇikāvasikā imi kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamā alikodakabudbudaphenasamā vitathāḥ parikalpasamutthita buddha budhaiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4731: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4732: jaravyādhidukhair hatatejavapuṃ vijahanti mṛgā iva śuṣkanadīm //
SA11sanssr_pu:4733: dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4734: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm //
SA11sanssr_pu:4735: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4736: dhanahīnu jarārditu yācanako bhavate tada apriyagṛdhrasamaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:4739: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4740: jarajīrṇa agāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune //
SA11sanssr_pu:4741: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghana śālavanam /
SA11sanssr_pu:4742: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo //
SA11sanssr_pu:4743: jara rūpa surūpavirūpakarī jara tejaharī balasthāmaharī /
SA11sanssr_pu:4744: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jara ojaharī //
SA11sanssr_pu:4745: bahurogaśatair ghanavyādhidukhaiḥ upasṛṣṭu jagaj jvalaneva mṛgāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4746: jara vyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu deśaya hī //
SA11sanssr_pu:4747: śiśirehi yathā himadhātu mahaṃ tṛṇagulmavanauṣadhi ojaharo /
SA11sanssr_pu:4748: tatha ojaharo 'yu vyādhi jage parihīyati indriyarūpabalam //
SA11sanssr_pu:4750: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe //
SA11sanssr_pu:4751: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4752: apunāgamanaṃ ca asaṃgamanaṃ drumapattraphalā nadiśrotu yathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:4753: maraṇaṃ vaśitān avaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadi dāru yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:4755: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalākari bhūtagaṇān /
SA11sanssr_pu:4756: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gaja jvalano va tṛṇauṣadhibhūtagaṇam / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:4758: tad yathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaś catvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyur dṛḍhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:4759_0: sāravanto 'khaṇḍā acchidrā asuṣirāḥ susaṃvṛtā ekaghanā nabhaḥ spṛśantaḥ pṛthivīṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:4759_2: tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena vā dravyamantrauṣadhibhir vā nivartayitum /
SA11sanssr_pu:4760: evam eva mahārāja catvārīmāni mahābhayāny āgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena dravyamantrauṣadhair vā nivartanaṃ kartum /
SA11sanssr_pu:4768: tad yathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇam anupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:4769: sa ca mṛgo 'tibalaṃ vyāḍamukham āsādya vivaśo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:4770_0: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyāparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu
SA11sanssr_pu:4770_4: e kākino 'dvitīyasyāsahāyasyemaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokam ākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato
SA11sanssr_pu:4770_5: mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahāndhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya

SA11sanssr_pu:5041: tatra pṛthivīdhātur nātmā na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5045_0: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo na jīvo na
SA11sanssr_pu:5045_1: jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cāpy anyasya kasyacit //
SA11sanssr_pu:5047: yā eṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5050: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5051: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5054: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni copādāya upādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5068: ye cānyae evamādaya upakleśās tae upāyāsāḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5069: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5070: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5071: puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āniñjyopagāś cemae ucyante 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5072: puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5073: apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5074: āniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5079: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ity ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5080: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5086: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5089: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5091: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5092: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5093: tad idaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam ucyate // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5101: atha cemāny asya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5112: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyābhinirvṛttir na bhavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:5119: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janita iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5120: api tu vijñānabīje karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhite tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyandite 'vidyāvakīrṇe tatra tatrotpattyāyatanasandhau mātuḥ kukṣau virohati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5122: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarādinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpy ahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5123: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5124: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:5125: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5127: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5134: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5149: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5151: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5155: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrotpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuram abhinirvartayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5156: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:5157: tan nādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5162: yasmād anye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anyae aupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5163: na tu yae eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhās tae evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5164: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānā aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5167: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpy aniruddheṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:5168: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5172: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5174: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ parīttaṃ karma kriyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5181_0: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputremaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:5181_1: yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam
SA11sanssr_pu:5181_2: abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham annāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam
SA11sanssr_pu:5182: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nnātmanaś ca samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5184: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nābhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
SA11sanssr_pu:5187: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvani /
SA11sanssr_pu:5190: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5196: api tu khalu punar yad ucyate 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5201: eṣāparāntiky apekṣāta ūrddhvam asy pravṛttir iti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5207: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvāsya saṃyogasyāsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo /
SA11sanssr_pu:5208: na cātyantopaśamaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇām adhigamiṣyāmaḥ satvaparipācanatāyai / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5216: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatva evaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5227: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5232: na parānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5236: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti śarīram iti kuṇapa iti āyatanam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5240: anityo vatāyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasāna iti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5245: so 'nityaḥ kāya iti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5246: anityaḥ kāya iti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5247: anityaḥ kāya iti jīvitenāśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5248: anityaḥ kāya iti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇādhyavasānaṃ na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5250: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5253: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nāśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5254: so nāśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātīty ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5256: yad utāyaṃ kāyo 'nupūrvasamudāgato 'nupūrvavināśo paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣira unnāmāvanāmau navavraṇamukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāsīviṣanivāsaḥ [doubtful] /
SA11sanssr_pu:5288: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5295: yāti kṣayaṃ naiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathābhimānā //
SA11sanssr_pu:5296: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram /
SA11sanssr_pu:5297: sūdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatābhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam //
SA11sanssr_pu:5299: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5306: asvādhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūta iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5308: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre /
SA11sanssr_pu:5309: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhāśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5311: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nāsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5314: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5315: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgānuśayaṃ pratijahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5316: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣānuśayaṃ prajahāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5317: yadāduṣkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5321: duṣkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na pratihanyate pratighasamudghātaṃ cārjayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5324: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5330: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5331: yad aduṣkhāsukhaṃ tad annātmakam ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5333: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpākṣaṇopapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5334: api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanopādānaṃ vedanopalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5338: vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5340: yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11sanssr_pu:5345: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5350: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5351: cittaṃ hi kāśyapārūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham aniketaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5352: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5353: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5357: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5358: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam annavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5359: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5361: cittaṃ hi kāśyapākāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5364: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5371: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa gandhārāmaṃ varāha ivāśucimadhye /
SA11sanssr_pu:5373: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśārāmaṃ makṣikeva tailapātre /
SA11sanssr_pu:5374: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5376: yan nopalabhyate tan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5377: yan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5378: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nevāsti na nāstīty ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5380: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5387: tasyaivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5389: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5390: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5392: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5395: tad yathā na tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā śakyate chettum /
SA11sanssr_pu:5396: na tenaivāṅgulyagreṇa tad evāṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5397: naiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5398: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutānavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:5400_1: cittasyāvasthānām ekāgratāśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathaikāgratāvikṣepa ity ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5407: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatītīyam ucyate viṭhapanety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5410: dharme dharmānudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5411: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5412: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5413: sa sarvadharmāniḥsaraṇam iti viditvānnāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5414: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5421: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva /
SA11sanssr_pu:5423: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5425: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharata evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5428: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate votpadyate vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5433: yādṛśāḥ samudānīyante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vākuśalā vā aniñjyā vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5435: na cāhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5437: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittānusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5441: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5447: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5448: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5449: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5450: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekaikaśu nāsti vartanā //
SA11sanssr_pu:5453: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro /
SA11sanssr_pu:5454: na ca anya tato na caiva tat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5456: saṃskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5457: saṃskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya ete prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5458: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5459: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskārannucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5460: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihopajāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5461: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5462: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmeti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5465: akahiñci gatam annāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:5467: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5468: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5469: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nāpy agatiś ca labhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5470: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5471: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5472: kaṇṭhauṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5473: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5474: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5477: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakopamāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5478: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
SA11sanssr_pu:5480: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5481: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam annāgamanaṃ na labhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5482: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5483: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:5487: śūnyā anāmakā dharmāḥ nāma kiṃ paripṛcchasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5488: śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nāpi rākṣasāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5489: manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5490: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5491: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5492: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5493: na cotpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmeha pṛcchasi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5495: ratnacitro hy ayaṃ nāmnā ratnottamapara iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5500: evaṃ yogyacitto daśasu dikṣu śeṣasya jagato duṣkhasāgaroddharaṇābhisaṃbodhyupāyo vyomaparyantatraikālyasarvadharmavaśavartitvāyaiva tu punaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatām avataret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5502: tataś ca chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5504: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlachinnasya sarvaśākhā patrapalāśāḥ śuṣyanti /

SA11sanssr_pu:5508: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu traśatī sugatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5509: so 'sau śūru na jātu istriṇāṃ vaśam etī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5517: so 'sau loṣṭakadaṇḍa tāḍito na ca kupyī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5518: so 'sau chidyati aṅgam aṅgaśo na ca kṣubhyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:5522: pañcyo tasya abhijña bhāvitā ima nityaṃ /

SA11sanssr_pu:5525_0: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny
SA11sanssr_pu:5525_1: aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:5525_4: sarvāvaraṇī yāni śodhayitukāmena sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /

SA11sanssr_pu:5527: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaikacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena /

SA11sanssr_pu:5531: karmaphalasaṃbandhāvirodhaś ca niḥsvabhāvatā ca yathādṛṣṭasarvadharmāvirodhaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:5537: kiṃ vaitad pratītyoktaṃ ṣaḍ ime mahārāja dhātavaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5539: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:5549: imāni ca mahārāja ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5555: tena pratyekam indriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayāṇāṃ bhedād aṣṭādaśa manopavicārā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5558: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatam upāttaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5561: keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5564: yat kiñcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭvaṃ kharagatam anupāttam ayam ucyate bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5565: tatra mahārājādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5566: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat strī adhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5567: sādhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5568: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogam ākāṅkṣate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5572: tatra mahārāja yaś ca saṃkalpo yaś ca saṃkalpayitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5576: iti hy asann asadbhūtaḥ saṃkalpo jātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5578: yathā saṃkalpas tathā saṃyogo 'pi kalalam api svabhāvena na saṃvidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5579: yaś ca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5580: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5582: bhavati mahārāja samayo yad ayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5583: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5591: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadākāśībhūte lokasaṃniveśe brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate mahāratnamayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5592: tan mahārāja kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5593: cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante dṛḍhāḥ sārā ekaghanā vajramayās teṣām api kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5594: sumeravaḥ parvatarājāno yugaṃdharā nimiṃdharā īśādharā yāvat kālaparvatāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5598: tad api mahārāja kakkhaṭatvaṃ samudāgacchat kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5599: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadāyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5600: tadeyaṃ mahāpṛthivī agninā vā dahyate 'dbhir vā klidyate vāyunā vā vikīryate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5601_0: tasyā agninā dahyamānāyā maṣir api na prajāyate tad yathāpi nāma sarpiṣo vā tailasya
SA11sanssr_pu:5601_1: vāgninā dahyamānasya na maṣir na chāyikā prajñāyate evam evāsyās trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyā
SA11sanssr_pu:5601_2: lokadhātor agninā dahyamānāyā naiva maṣir na chāyikāvaśiṣṭā prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5602: evam adbhir lavaṇavilayavad vāyunā vairambhavātābhihataśakuntavat pṛthivyāṃ na kiñcid avaśiṣṭaṃ prajñāyatae iti paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5603: tatra mahārāja pṛthivīdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ vyayo 'pi śūnya utpanno 'pi pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya /
SA11sanssr_pu:5604: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5605: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5606: evam evaitan mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5608: yad idam asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āpaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5614: aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vaśā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaḥ śoṇitaṃ kṣīraṃ prasrāva ity ādir ayam ucyante ādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5615: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat priyaṃ dṛṣṭvāśru pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5618: yāvat sa mahārājābdhātur na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5619: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ pariśuṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5620: sa pariśuṣyan nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5622: vivartamāne khalu punar loke samantād dvātriṃśat paṭalā abhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante saṃsthāya sarvāvantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5628: tata iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokād udakena sphuṭā bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5629: sa mahārāja tāvan mahān abdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5630: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5631: saṃvartamāne khalu punar loke dvitīyasya sūryasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5632: dvitīyasya sūryasa loke prādurbhāvād utsāḥ sarāṃsi kunadyaś ca śuṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5635: caturthasya sūryasya prādurbhāvān mahāsamudrasya yojanikam apy udakaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5636: dviyojanikam api tricatuḥpañcadaśaviṃśatitriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśadyojanikam api yāvac catvāriṃśadyojanasahasram udakam avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5640: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre pṛthitapṛthitāny avaśiṣṭāni bhavanti / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5641: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre 'ṅgulisnehamātram apy udakaṃ nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5642: sa mahārāja tāvān abdhātur nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5644: tasya khalu punar mahārājābdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5645: vyayo 'pi śūnyaḥ tiṣṭhann api so 'bdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya iti hi mahārājābdhātur abdhātutvenopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahāramātrāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5646: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ pūrvavat //

SA11sanssr_pu:5652: yasya cotsadatvāj jvarito jvarita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5654: yad bāhyaṃ tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5656_0: yan manuṣyā araṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kārpāsapicunāvāsam
SA11sanssr_pu:5656_1: anveṣante yad utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati grāmapradeśam api dahati yāvad dvīpaṃ vā
SA11sanssr_pu:5656_2: kakṣaṃ tṛṇānāṃ vā dāvaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā yāvad dahan paraitīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5657: tatra mahārājādhyātmikas tejodhātur utpadyate na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5658: iti hy abhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca prativigacchati svabhāvarahitatvāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:5659: evaṃ yat kiñcid asmin kāye vāyur vāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5661: tad yathā ūrdhvagamā vāyavo 'dhogamāḥ pārśvāśrayāḥ pṛṣṭhāśrayāḥ kukṣigamāḥ śastrakāḥ kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ pippalakā vātāṣṭhīlā vātagulmā āśvāsapraśvāsā aṅgānusāriṇo vāyava ity ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5662: santi bahirdhā pūrve vāyavo dakṣiṇāḥ paścimā uttarā vāyavaḥ sarajasaḥ arajasaḥ parīttā mahadgatā vāyava iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5663: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāvāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5667: yaṃ satvāś cīvarakarṇikena vā vidhamanakena vātānuvṛttena vā paryeṣyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5671: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam upagatam upāttam ākāśagatam ihābhyantarasaṃkhyābhūtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5674: yad asmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiram iti vā yāvan mukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍyā vā yena cābhyavaharati yatra cāvatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5677: evaṃ bāhye 'pi yad asphuṭam aspharaṇīyaṃ rūpagatenāpaliguddhaṃ suṣirabhāvaś chidraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5679: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat karmapratyayād āyatanāni prādurbhavanti tāny ākāśadhātuṃ paricārayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5680: tatra saṃkhyā bhavaty ādhyātmika ākāśadhātur iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5682: bhavati samayo yad rūpaṃ bibharti sarvam ākāśībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5687: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣa utthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ vā puṣkariṇīṃ vā khānayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5688: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tatrākāśaḥ kutas tad āgatam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5692: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punar eva tad udapānaṃ vā yāvat puṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5693: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tad ākāśaṃ kvacid gatam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5697: na hy ākāśadhātur gamane vā āgamane vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5709: yāvad iti hi mahārāja yā kācid varṇasaṃsthānaprativijñaptir ayam ucyate cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5711: iti hi yā ṣaḍindriyādhipateyā ṣaḍviṣayārambaṇā viṣayavijñaptir ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5712: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur nendriyaniśrito na viṣayebhya āgato na madhye 'ntarasthāyī sa nādhyātma bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:5713: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur vastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5714: sa utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5715: tasya khalu punar vijñānadhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5718: iti mahārāja vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyo nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5719: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5723: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātor abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor yāvat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5724: tatra pṛthivīdhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ nābdhātuprasādo na tejodhātuprasādo na vāyudhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5726: na hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5727: evaṃ yāvan na vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmasyāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5729: niśceṣṭā hy ete dharmā niṣṭhāpārā nirvāṇasamā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5730: iti hi mahārāja ekaikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nopalabhate 'nyatra vyavahārāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5734: ye ca dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kas teṣāṃ prasādo vā kṣobho vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5735: yeṣāṃ na prasādo na kṣobha upalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5737: iti hy atyantatayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato nopalabhyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5739: annāgamanatāṃ gamanatāṃ copādāya sthānam apy asya nopalabhyate svabhāvavirahitatvāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5750: yāvad iti hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣābhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprāptikā avyavahārā annabhilāpyā annabhilapanīyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5751: yatra mahārāja indriyāṇi pratihanyante te viṣayā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5752: cakṣur hi rūpe pratihanyate tasmād rūpāṇi cakṣurviṣayā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5754: tatra cakṣū rūpe pratihanyata iti nipātaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5756: tathā hi cakṣū rūpeṣu trividhaṃ nipatatīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5761: tae ime viṣayā manogocarā ity ucyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:5765: yad etan mahārāja mano 'pratikūleṣu rūpeṣv anunītaṃ carati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5767: pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5770: evaṃ śabdādiṣv api trividham ārambaṇam anubhavati pūrvavat //
SA11sanssr_pu:5773: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5775: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī /
SA11sanssr_pu:5779: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5785: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5787: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5790: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5793: trividhaṃ kāyena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5794: tac ca karmābhisaṃskṛtam ādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5795: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nottarāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho nānuvidiśaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5799: jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāc caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5800: tad yathāpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇīti manasa ārambaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5801: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmaṇā ārambaṇenaupapattyaṃśikadvayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5802: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā āsure kāye yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā deveṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:5803: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyānnantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5805: tatra yaś caramavijñānasya nirodhas tatra cyutir iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5807: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5809: tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati //
SA11sanssr_pu:5813: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5822: karmaṇāṃ cābandhyatā prajāyate vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā na cātra kaścit kartā na bhoktānyatra nāmasaṃketāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5823: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5826: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare śatruḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5831: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5837: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrur na saṃvidyate kutaḥ punas tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5838: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yas tam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5840: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san pratihanyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5843: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣah suptaḥ svapnāntare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃoham āpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5844: sa śayitavibuddhas taṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmoham anusmaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5845: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5846: yāvad evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san muhyati mūḍho mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskarotīti pūrvavat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5847: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5849: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret /
SA11sanssr_pu:5850: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet /
SA11sanssr_pu:5855: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5857: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:5860: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5862: evaṃ gandhādiṣu tridhā tridhā veditavyam // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5864: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5869: mukto mocayeyam āśvasta āśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5870: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate aiśvaryādhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5871: iti hi mahārāja māyopamānīndriyāṇy atṛptāny atarṣaṇīyāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:5873: atrānnantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛta evaṃ paṭhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5874: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati /
SA11sanssr_pu:5876: evam eva mahārājānnantayaśā avasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5877: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam annantayaśasaṃ tathāvasīdantaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5883_2: hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvopakaraṇavarṣaṃ cānubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā
SA11sanssr_pu:5883_3: śakrasyārdhāsanam ākramyātīcchayā na mukto 'tṛpta eva kāmaiḥ kālagata iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5884: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryā ity evam uktvā ca rājānnantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5885: tasmāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5886: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyatae ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5890: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5894: annājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nālābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5896: tatra jinena jagasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:5897: yena jagat sugatasya sakāśe saṃjanayīha prasādasukhārthe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5898: saṃvṛti prajñamayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaḍgatayo bhaṇi satvagaṇānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5899: narakatiraś ca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃś ca marūṃś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:5900: nīcakulāṃs tatha uccakulāṃś ca āḍhyakulāṃś ca daridrakulāṃś cety ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5902: katama eṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanssr_pu:5903: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanā āho śvit saṃjñā utāho saṃskārā atha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:5905: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA11sanssr_pu:5910: tad evam annupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5914: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5917: nālam atra paṇḍitair abhiniveśa utpādayitavya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5921: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir annantakoṭir annāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5926: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcānantaryāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:5928: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5933: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nopalabhāmahe /
SA11sanssr_pu:5936: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5937: koṭim api sa tasyopalabhate dvaye cāsau caratīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5939: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhābhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5940: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathaiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5941: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5942: na ca vacana cāsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti //
SA11sanssr_pu:5943: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na cāsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5944: tatha imi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5945: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5946: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5947: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam /
SA11sanssr_pu:5948: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5949: yatha naru iha indrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:5950: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5951: puravara yatha aṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham /
SA11sanssr_pu:5952: yatha nagara tathāṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5953: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5954: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5955: ... ... hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nāpi snehadhātuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5956: vimṛśatu bherīva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5957: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam /
SA11sanssr_pu:5958: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvāḥ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5959: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nāpi sa svatantraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5960: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5963: satvaś cāsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat /
SA11sanssr_pu:5965: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjāriham //
SA11sanssr_pu:5966: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [doubtful] daśaddiśigataṃ naivaṃ parīdṛśyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:5967: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devātideva tvayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:5968: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5969: tena tvāṃ dvipadottamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjāriham //
SA11sanssr_pu:5970: satvānaiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyāpanītaṃ dukhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5971: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair noditāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5973: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5975: naivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā naiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5976: uktaṃ co sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5977: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:5978: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye /
SA11sanssr_pu:5979: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:5980: śamathaś cātha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune /
SA11sanssr_pu:5981: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ / ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:5984: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5985: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa notpadyate na nirudhyate / pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:5986: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nopalabhyate na tac cakṣur nendriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5988: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ no tu khalu paramārthato riktam upalabhyate na muṣṭiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5989: evaṃ cakṣuś cendriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālopalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram //
SA11sanssr_pu:5993: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:5995: atraiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
SA11sanssr_pu:5998: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenāsya vyākaraṇam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6005: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibimbam /
SA11sanssr_pu:6007: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumāṅgaśo vicārayasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:6010: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6011: śakaṭāṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya caiva kriyāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6012: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6013: vāteritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6014: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutāśanaṃ ca yajane /
SA11sanssr_pu:6015: na nivartate vahnis tathaiva karmasya kartāraḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6016: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6019: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin /
SA11sanssr_pu:6023: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharma utpadyate utānnutpannaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6025: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasyotpattim icchāmi na cānnutpannasyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6027: tathatā tathateti kulaputra śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6028: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6030: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā notpatsyante na nirotsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6033: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathābhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā notpadyante na nirudhyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6036: saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante cety asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6039: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyottrāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ceti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6040: na cātra kasyacid dharmasyotpādo na nirodha iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6042: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6050: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6052: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ paraḥparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6058: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti naite kasyacit /
SA11sanssr_pu:6060: naite bhagavan dharmā udvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6061: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye /
SA11sanssr_pu:6064: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6066: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6068: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6069: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6070: tathā dharmadarśanaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ sarvasatvadarśanaṃ sarvasatvahetupratyayadarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanam adarśanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6071: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6075: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramārthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād /
SA11sanssr_pu:6076: amūlā eva ca sarvadharmās tatvato mūlānupapatteḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6087: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmā iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6098: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6099: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6100: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6101: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte /
SA11sanssr_pu:6103_0: nāsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nāsau śūnyatāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:6103_1: jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam
SA11sanssr_pu:6106: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrāvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra yatnaṃ kṛtvā śīghraṃ cittaśuddhir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6108: sā caitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmāvajñā caivaṃ bhāvanīyā //
