SA11sanssr_pu:6504: alam ebhiḥ satvair evaṃ khaṭuṅkair evaṃ durdāntair iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6508: na ca satvārthavaimukhyasya bodhisatvapariśuddhāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6509: tatra prājño bodhisatva evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6510: tasmāt satvadhātor ye satvāḥ syuḥ pratyavarā dhajaḍaiḍamūkajātīyāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6511: aparinirvāṇadharmakāḥ kṛtsnā satvadhātau na cikitsitāḥ sarvabuddhaiḥ sarvabodhisatvaiś ca pratyākhyātāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6513: tān ahaṃ sarvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdyānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhayeyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6514: evaṃ hi bodhisatvasya cintayataś cittotpāde cittotpāde sarvamārabhavanāni prakampante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6521: yasya punar āśayo nāsti sarve buddhadharmās tasya dūre //
SA11sanssr_pu:6522: āśayasaṃpannasya punar bhagavan yadi buddhā na bhavanti gaganatalād dharmaśabdo niścarati kuḍmavṛkṣebhyaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6523: āśayaśuddhasya bodhisatvasya svamanojalpād eva sarvāvavādānuśāsanyo niścaranti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6525: tad yathā bhagavan yasya pādau tasya gamanaṃ evaṃ bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhadharmāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6526: tad yathā bhagavan yasyottamāṅgaṃ tasya jīvitaṃ evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhabodhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6527: tad yathā bhagavan yasya jīvitaṃ tasya lābhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6528: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhatvalābhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6531: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati bodhisatvasya sarvabuddhadharmā jvalanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6533: tad yathā bhagavan satsv abhramegheṣu varṣaṃ varṣaty asatsu na varṣati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6534: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati buddhadharmāḥ pravartante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6535: tad yathā bhagavan yasya vṛkṣasya mūlaṃ vipannaṃ tasya puṣpaphalāni na bhūyaḥ prarohanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6536: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayo vipannas tasya sarve kuśalā dharmā na bhūyaḥ saṃbhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6537: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisatvena buddhabodhyarthikena svāśayaḥ sūdgṛhītaḥ svārakṣitaḥ suśodhitaḥ svadhiṣṭhitaḥ kartavya iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6583: tad evaṃ vyavasāyāśayau dṛḍhīkṛtya kāruṇyaṃ puraḥkṛtya yate śubhavṛddhaye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6585: atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:6587: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisatvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6591: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6592: tad yathā bhagavan yena rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6594: evam eva bhagavan yena bodhisatvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6596: tad yathā bhagavann āditye udite satvāḥ karmakriyāsu pracurā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6597: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇā yatroditā bhavati tatrānyabodhikarā dharmāḥ kriyāsu pracurā bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6598: tad yathā bhagavan sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ manasādhiṣṭhitānāṃ svasvaviṣaye grahaṇaprācuryaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6599: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhitānām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svasmin svasmin karaṇīye prācuryaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6600: tad yathā bhagavan jīvitendriye saty anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:6601: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6603: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta sāradvatīputra puruṣasya jīvitendriyasyāśvāsāḥ praśvāsāḥ pūrvaṃgamāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6604: evam eva bhadanta sāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāyānasamudāgatasya mahākaruṇā pūrvaṃgamāḥ // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6605: syād yathāpi nāma śreṣṭhino vā gṛhapater vā ekaputrake guṇavati majjāgataṃ prema /
SA11sanssr_pu:6606: evam eva mahākaruṇāpratilabdhasya bodhisatvasya sarvasatveṣu majjāgataṃ premeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6608: svakam annekavidhaṃ pūrvānubhūtam anubhūyamānaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ bhayaṃ ca svātmany atyantam anniṣṭaṃ bhāvayitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6609: priyādiṣu maitrī maitrīvatā bhāvayitavyā pratyutpannaduṣkhavyādhiṣu mahāduṣkhasāgarānavadhidīrghasaṃsāravyasanānunīteṣu vā //
SA11sanssr_pu:6611: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty āścaryaṃ yāvad ajñānasaṃmūḍhā vateme bālapṛthagjanāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6612: yeṣām asaṃkhyeyā ātmabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6613: evaṃ ca kṣīyamāṇā kāye na nirvedam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6627: apratiśaraṇāḥ tathā saṃvegam āpadyante bahūni duṣkhāni pratyanubhavantaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6629_0: hantāham eṣāṃ satvānāṃ duṣkhārtānām anāthānām atrāṇānām aśaraṇānām alayanānām āparāyaṇānām
SA11sanssr_pu:6630: yathārūpeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayena saṃbhṛtena ime sarvasatvā abhyantaviśuddhim anuprāpnuyur iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6632: saṃsārāṭavīkāntāramārgaprapannā vateme satvā nirayatiryagyoniyamalokaprapātābhimukhāḥ kudṛṣṭiviṣamajālānuprāptāḥ mohagahanasaṃchannā mithyāmārgavitathaprayātā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6643: te 'smābhir mahākuśalamūlabalenoddhṛtya nirupadrave arajasi śivasarvajñatāratnadvīpe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6645: te asmābhiḥ sarvatraidhātukaviveke abhayapure sarvaduṣkhopaśame [doubtful] annāvaraṇanirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:6646: evam ebhiḥ paraḥparadṛḍhīkṛtyair vyavasāyāśayakāruṇyaiḥ puṇyavṛddhim ārabhet /
SA11sanssr_pu:6647: tatra tāvad bhadrācāryāvidhiḥ kāryā vandanādiḥ sadādarāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:6648: āryogradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ hi trirātre trir divasasya ca śuceḥ śucivastraprāvṛtasya ca triskandhakapravartanam uktaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6662: iha bodhisatvo yānīmāni bhavanti puṣpajātāni vā phalajātāni vā amamāny aparigrahāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:6663: tāni triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayati // pe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6664: sayathīme [doubtful] dhūpavṛkṣā vā gandhavṛkṣā vā ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā vā amamā aparigrahās tān api triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayatīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6668: anayā ca diśā sarvabhaiṣajyāni sarvarasāyanāni sarvasalilāni annavadyāni ammaṇḍalāni /
SA11sanssr_pu:6670: vivṛtteṣu vā lokadhātuṣu ye paramarasasparśasaṃpannā bhūparpaṭakāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6674: pariśuddheṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye ramaṇīyatarāḥ paribhogāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6767: etac ca bhāvayan sarvatra pariṇāmayāmīti yojyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6768: āryāvalokiteśvaravimokṣe ca yad uktaṃ tad apy evaṃ yojyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6788: saṃkṣepataḥ punar iyam annuttarā pariṇāmanā yeyam āryabhadracaryāgāthāyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6789: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantata bhadra tathaiva /
SA11sanssr_pu:6790: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6791: sarvatriyadhva gatebhi jinebhir yā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6792: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6793: iti śikṣāsamuccaye bhadracaryāvidhiḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6800: varjayaty akṣaṇāny aṣṭau yae ime deśitā mayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6802: varṇavān rūpasaṃpanno lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ sthāmnā balena copeto nāsau kausīdyam ṛcchati [doubtful] //
SA11sanssr_pu:6803: āḍhyo mahādhanaś cāsau adhṛṣyaḥ puṇyavān api /
SA11sanssr_pu:6806: bhaved dānapatiḥ śūro muktatyāgo hy amatsarī //
SA11sanssr_pu:6810: rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhān satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6811: ścyuta/ cāsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane /
SA11sanssr_pu:6813: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6814: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6815: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6816: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate //
SA11sanssr_pu:6819: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6820: yaś ceha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6821: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6822: tasyeha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6824: vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6829: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6830: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān //
SA11sanssr_pu:6832: satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6833: cakravartī ca rājāsau śakraś ca bhavatīśvaraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6834: brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6836: sarve 'syārthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6837: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatropapadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6840: priyaḥ sadayitaś cāsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6841: davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6843: te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6844: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6845: tasyānuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6846: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6847: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6848: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahānubhāvo vidu cakravartī /
SA11sanssr_pu:6849: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke //
SA11sanssr_pu:6852: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6853: tasyeha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6854: pāṇītaleṣu suruciru muktahārāḥ prādurbhavantī vividha annantakalpāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6855: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6856: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6857: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6858: suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6859: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6860: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:6861: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati annantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6862: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sada apramattaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6863: na tasya agniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6864: adho upādāya ca vibhavāgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6865: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriya evarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayata eka dīpam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6866: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitāṅgo dṛḍhāsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:6867: ālokaprāpto [doubtful] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6868: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6869: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6870: alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6871: tasyeha bhoty asadṛśa ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6872: yebhir jinasya pratapata ātmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [doubtful] kāñcanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:6873: jāmbūnado vā suruciradarśanīyā abhikīrṇa ... kusumita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6875: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6876: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6878: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit /
SA11sanssr_pu:6879: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datveha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6880: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6881: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarāṅgu tasyāvikala viśuddha bhoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6882: viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6883: ghraṇendriyaṃ parama uttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6884: jihvāsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6885: raktā pravālā yathariva [doubtful] devatānāṃ svarāṅga koṭīvara sṛjate 'prameyāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6886: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nāpi ca nāmitāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6887: viśiṣṭa bhotī surucira ātmabhāvo vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6888: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahorago vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6889: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6890: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6891: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6892: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:6893: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:6894: pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe /
SA11sanssr_pu:6895: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhānulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6896: durgandhikāmān aśucijugupsanīyān varjeti nityaṃ pratiṣṭhita śīlaskandhe /
SA11sanssr_pu:6897: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6898: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke arthaṃ sahasrā tulayati no cireṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:6899: karoti cārthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6900: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6901: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6902: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6903: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
SA11sanssr_pu:6904: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś cāsya viśiṣṭa bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6905: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6906: śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6907: naiṣkramyaprāptau ca adīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6908: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6909: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6910: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñābhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:6911: viśālaprajño viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
SA11sanssr_pu:6912: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān /
SA11sanssr_pu:6917: na tasya rājāpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6918: kumārga sarvaṃ pithita apāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6919: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6920: śokāṃś ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty annekān /
SA11sanssr_pu:6921: āśvāsaprāptaś ca annantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6923: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
SA11sanssr_pu:6924: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6925: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6926: yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6927: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6928: tasyeha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devāsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:6929: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśa īśvarāṃś ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6930: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne /
SA11sanssr_pu:6931: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti caiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham //
SA11sanssr_pu:6932: paricāro 'sya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6933: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadābhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6934: paricāra bhoty asya svarāṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:6935: na tasya kaścij janayati ceśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya /
SA11sanssr_pu:6937: ākruṣṭaḥ san nājanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6938: devendra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā /
SA11sanssr_pu:6939: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatīha stūpaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6940: nāsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6941: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam //
SA11sanssr_pu:6942: sūtrāntacaryā na kadācid asya nāsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke /
SA11sanssr_pu:6943: satvāś ca tṛptā muditāsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6945: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6946: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nāsya bhonti atulyatāptaś ca susaṃsthitāṅgaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6947: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6949: tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:6950: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalamatreṣu dhātuṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:6951: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6952: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyāntaśa ekapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6953: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān annādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6954: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6957: saced antaśaḥ svapnāntaragatā api satvā buddham ālambyākāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmīti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6959: aṣṭābhir bhujagādhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:6966: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:6976: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6979: na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihārāgito jinaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:6990: varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:6991: kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:6995: kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narottamam /
SA11sanssr_pu:6996: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:6997: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:6998: api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7001: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajopamānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7003: yaś cānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed /
SA11sanssr_pu:7005: kaḥ punar vādo yo 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:7008: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7015: tathāgatacaityeṣu puṣpāvaropaṇaṃ gandhānulepanaṃ kṛtvāṣṭāv avikalatā anuprāpnoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7022: na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikala iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7024: ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena /
SA11sanssr_pu:7026: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7028: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:7030: ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7031: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekaikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7032: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:7033: yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvādīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:7034: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7035: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti / peyālaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7036_0: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ
SA11sanssr_pu:7036_1: satkuryuḥ yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:7037: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahārghataraṃ ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:7038: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7039: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād /
SA11sanssr_pu:7040: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7041: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:7042: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśa ekapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet /
SA11sanssr_pu:7043: asya dānasyaitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7046: catura imān bhadrānuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7048: agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati māṃ ca dṛṣṭvānye 'pi tathā śikṣiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7049: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7050: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7060: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvā annanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7070: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sāmiṣeṇa /
SA11sanssr_pu:7072: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7076: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7077: caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7078: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7079: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati //
SA11sanssr_pu:7080: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:7082: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palāgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7083: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7084: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanssr_pu:7086: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7091: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7092: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7094_0: evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatropapatsyante tatra
SA11sanssr_pu:7094_1: tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś ca arcitāś ca apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7097: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣūpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargopapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7099_0: tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhāvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny
SA11sanssr_pu:7099_1: anumoditāni yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyān satvān
SA11sanssr_pu:7101_0: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās
SA11sanssr_pu:7101_1: te sarve 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratitiṣṭheyur annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya
SA11sanssr_pu:7101_2: gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
SA11sanssr_pu:7102: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7103_1: sarvam ekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣam anumodetāgrayānumodanayā
SA11sanssr_pu:7103_2: jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttarayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā
SA11sanssr_pu:7104_1: bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad
SA11sanssr_pu:7106: athavāgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7109: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsā āryograparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7117: catvāra ime mahārāja dharmā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartante 'parihāṇāya ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:7124: yena gauraveṇa subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇoti śuśrūṣate 'virahitaśrotraś ca dharmaṃ śṛṇoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7126: yayā nirmānatayā āryāṇām abhinamati praṇamati namasyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:7128: yena vīryeṇa kāyalaghutāṃ cittalaghutāṃ ca pratilabhate sarvakāryāṇi cottārayati //
SA11sanssr_pu:7134: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7140: yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7141: sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7145: sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nānuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7146: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7149: yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7151: yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7154: yān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati tān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkarotīdam ucyate samādhīndriyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7156: yān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkaroti tān prajñendriyeṇa pratyavekṣate pratividhyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7157: yad eteṣu dharmeṣu pratyātmajñānam aparapratyayajñānam idam ucyate prajñendriyaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7158: evam imāni pañcendriyāṇi sahitāny anuprabaddhāni sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrayanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7163: yad ebhir evendriyair upastabdho 'nnavamardyo bhavati sarvamāraiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7175: yāvanti pūjā bahuvidha aprameyā yā kṣetrakoṭīn ayutabimbareṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7176: tāṃ pūjakṛtvā puruṣavareṣu nityaṃ saṃkhyākalāpo na bhavati maitracitta / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7180: vandāmi te asamajñānaparā sadṛśo na te 'sti tribhave virajā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7181: mṛdu cāru snigdha śubha keśa nakhā girirājatulya tava coṣṇir iha /
SA11sanssr_pu:7182: noṣnīṣam īkṣitu tavāsti samo vibhrājate bhruvi tavorṇa mune //
SA11sanssr_pu:7184: kṛpayekṣase jagad idaṃ hi yayā vandāmi te vimalanetra jina //
SA11sanssr_pu:7185: jihvā prabhūta tanu tāmranibhā vadanaṃ ca chādayasi yena svakaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7186: dharmaṃ vadan vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasnigdhagirā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7187: daśanāḥ śubhāḥ sudṛḍha vajranibhāḥ triṃśaddaśāpy aviralāḥ sahitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7188: kurvan smitaṃ vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasatyakathā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7189: rūpeṇa cāpratisamo 'si jinaḥ prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7190: brahmendrapālajagato bhagavan jihmībhavanti tava te prabhayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7192: īkṣan vrajasy api yugaṃ bhagavan saṃkampayan dharaṇiśailataṭān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7193: kāyaś ca lakṣaṇacito bhagavan sūkṣma chavī kanakavarṇanibhā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7194: nekṣañ jagad vrajati tṛptim idaṃ rūpaṃ tavāpratimarūpadhara //
SA11sanssr_pu:7197: tvaṃ dānaśīlanirataḥ satataṃ tvaṃ kṣāntivīryanirataḥ sudṛḍhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7199: tvaṃ vādisūra kugaṇapramathī tvaṃ siṃhavan nadasi parṣadi ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:7200: tvaṃ vaidyarāja trimalāntakaro vandāmi te paramaprītikara //
SA11sanssr_pu:7203: māyopamaṃ jagad imaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ viditaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7204: nātmā na satva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7205: śūnyāś ca śānta annutpādanayaṃ avijānad eva jagad udbhramati /

SA11sanssr_pu:7522: te catu mārapathā atikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti annuttara bodhiṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7523: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7524: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tena utaptavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7525: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7526: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7527: pāpa kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7528: varṇita dhyāna praśānta araṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7529: prajñaviyūha ya osari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7530: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye asmin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7533: rājyadhanātmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7534: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7535: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7536: buddha sahasra anneka acintyān paśyiṣu padmavaneṣu niṣaṇṇān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7538: buddhabalāviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7539: te 'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāyābhayārdita satva saspṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7541: ye abhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7542: trāyita yaccharaṇāgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7543: sarvasukhāvaha osari raśmī tāya gilānaya ātura spṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7545: rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7546: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7547: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacodita āyu kṣayānte /
SA11sanssr_pu:7548: buddha anusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7549: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā jinabimbān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7550: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇānte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7551: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7552: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7554: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7555: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7556: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7559: te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7560: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7561: duṣkha anneka upadravapūrṇaṃ bhāṣita saṃskṛta nityam akṣemaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7562: śāntinirodhasukhaṃ sada kṣemaṃ bhāṣayatā amṛtaṃdada labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7563: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7565: śīlata agra samādhita agro prajñata agra mahāmunirājā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7566: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7567: ratnaviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7568: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn //
SA11sanssr_pu:7569: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7570: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7571: gandhaprabhāsa ya osari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7572: ghrātvā amānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7579: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalopama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7580: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7581: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7583: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagna acela subhūṣaṇa bhontī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7585: raśmi rasāgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasāgra labhantī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7586: bhojana pāna vicitra rasāgrān datva rasāgravatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7587: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7588: akṣayaratnanidhiṃ tribhi ratnair dānata arthanidarśani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7589: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram /
SA11sanssr_pu:7590: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7591: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthuśabdān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7593: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7594: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7595: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutai stuti buddhān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7596: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇa udīrita raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7597: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna svindriya bhonti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7598: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7599: cittaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7600: citta samādhivaśānuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7601: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpanarendrān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7603: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabda aśabdata śūnya vijānī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7604: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7605: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7606: gandhavarāgra janair jinastūpān snāpanabodhidruma prabha eṣā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7607: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasāgrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7609: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7610: śaktitriśūlāsi [doubtful] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumotpala bhontī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7611: duṣya anneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7613: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7615: pratyaya jāta ajāta svabhāvā dharmaśarīra ajātaśarīrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7616: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7617: raśmi sukhāpramukhā iti kṛtvā ekatu romamukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7619: te yatha ekata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajopama raśmī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7620: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7621: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve /
SA11sanssr_pu:7622: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇa eṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7623: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7624: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhopacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7625: ye ca śubhopacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7626: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7627: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī no ca sa nāsti udeti sa loke /
SA11sanssr_pu:7628: cakṣusameta udāgamu jñātvā sarva prayujya svaka svaka dharme //
SA11sanssr_pu:7629: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7630: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7631: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7632: te pi tu asti mahātmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7633: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7634: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7635: yasy imu [doubtful] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti [doubtful] prasādaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7636: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nāṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7641: te daśakṣetrarajopama anye padmam adhiṣṭhihi saṃparivāraṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7642: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7643: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpadita buddhaguṇeṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7644: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarva udikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7645: te ca samāhita bālaśarīre vyutthihi yauvanavegasthitebhyaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7646: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7652: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddhavarāgraśarīrā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7658: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7659: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7660: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7661: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramāṇurajātaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7662: ekarajasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvarajebhya aśeṣam /
SA11sanssr_pu:7665: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7669: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahātmā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7670: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7671: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganānusmṛtīmān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7672: eti samādhi vimokṣa acintyās teṣa acintyaguṇopacitānāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7673: kalpa acintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum //
SA11sanssr_pu:7674: sarvajinebhi ca bhāṣita ete karmavipāku jagasya acintyo /
SA11sanssr_pu:7675: nāgavikurvita buddhavikurvā dhyāyina dhyāna acintya vikurvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7676: te ca vaśe sthita aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvaka eka bhavībahu bhontī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7677: bhūtva bahuḥ puna eka bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin //
SA11sanssr_pu:7678: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi annarthiku loka upekṣī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7679: darśayi kāyavikurva acintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitaiṣī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7680: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7682: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7684: sāgaradeva rutāvatināmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7685: teṣu svarāṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena //
SA11sanssr_pu:7686: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7687: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam //
SA11sanssr_pu:7688: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitra annantān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7690: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7691: dhyāna abhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7692: rāhu yatheṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7693: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7694: so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayi īdṛśa ṛddhī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7695: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi annantā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7697: yātuka bimbarannekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān //
SA11sanssr_pu:7698: sarvasurendrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svāyum /
SA11sanssr_pu:7699: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurendrāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7700: netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7701: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurendrāḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7702: so hita itvarapuṇyabalenā śakra vikurvati devajayārthī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7703: sarvajagasya aśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī //
SA11sanssr_pu:7704: ... vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī /
SA11sanssr_pu:7705: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhāvaha sarvajagasya //
SA11sanssr_pu:7706: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7707: darśayi lokavipāka acintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7714: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7717: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7718: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7722: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7728: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7730: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7732: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7736: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7738: sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7740: sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām annekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7743: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7749: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam /
SA11sanssr_pu:7751: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya /
SA11sanssr_pu:7753: sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhya eva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7756: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:7757: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7759: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkāropakaraṇena ca /
SA11sanssr_pu:7761: te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇāni haranti tebhya evaitad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /
SA11sanssr_pu:7762: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodha utpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7763: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasāparāddhavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7764: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7765: annuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7766: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre /
SA11sanssr_pu:7767: ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante //
SA11sanssr_pu:7768: pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7775: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7776: aho vatālpapuṇyā amī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7777_0: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
SA11sanssr_pu:7777_1: abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7778: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathāṣṭāṅgopetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7779: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7780: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7782_0: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me
SA11sanssr_pu:7782_1: 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:7782_2: sarvathā sarvaṃ evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7783: sukhitā eva te satvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7784: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evākāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7785: tad yathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7786: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7787: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadeti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7797: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7813: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7814: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7815: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇārādhitaḥ syāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7816_0: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve
SA11sanssr_pu:7816_1: 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
SA11sanssr_pu:7817: tat kiṃ manyase ānandāpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7821: ataḥ sa ānanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7822: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7829: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7831: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetānnuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7835: kālena co cintayamānu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7836: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśeta alīnacittaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7837: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7838: udāraprajñapta karitva āsanaṃ caukṣe manojñe pṛthivīpradeśe //
SA11sanssr_pu:7839: caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7840: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7842: sudhautapādaś ca upāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena cāpi //
SA11sanssr_pu:7843: dharmāsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekāgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan /
SA11sanssr_pu:7844: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś co bhikṣunikās tathaiva //
SA11sanssr_pu:7845: kilāsitāś cāpi vivarjayīta na cāpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7846: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:7847: bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭāntakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7848: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathaiva toṣayet na cāpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:7849: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vastrāṇi śayyāsanacīvarāṇi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7850: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñapet parṣadi kiñcid anyat //
SA11sanssr_pu:7851: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7852: etac ca me sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke //
SA11sanssr_pu:7854: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇāpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7856: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7858: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7859: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7860: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7862: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7863: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7864: bhaveyur yadi cālpecchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7865: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām //
SA11sanssr_pu:7867: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7893: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārābhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7894_0: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ
SA11sanssr_pu:7894_1: tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyemāni mantrapadāny
SA11sanssr_pu:7895: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatā upasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe /
SA11sanssr_pu:7896: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7897: atraivāha / dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7901: tad yathāpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante /
SA11sanssr_pu:7902: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhāropacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7904: eṣādikā ādikarmikāṇāṃ sahasā bodhisatvaśikṣā smaraṇārtham upadarśitā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7909: tatrānnutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām annutpādāyaiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātīty anena rakṣā //
SA11sanssr_pu:7910: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatīty anena śuddhiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7911: annutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7912: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatīty ādi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7914: etāni ca nityam apramādādhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt //
SA11sanssr_pu:7916: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7917: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita / iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7920: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchilasaṃkrameṇa bhṛtyasya gacchataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7924: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7926: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7928: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7930: punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyārakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7931: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca tasyānulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7932: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7933: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7934: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati /
SA11sanssr_pu:7935: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7936: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakādhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astīti prajānāti /
SA11sanssr_pu:7938: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi //
SA11sanssr_pu:7940: sadāpramādo hy amṛtasya mūlaṃ satvārthayuktasya ca bodhicittaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7941: yad yoniśaś caiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti //
SA11sanssr_pu:7944: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyāstv apāratā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7945: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet //
SA11sanssr_pu:7946: tadduṣkhena na me bādhety ato yadi na rakṣasi /
SA11sanssr_pu:7947: nāgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi //
SA11sanssr_pu:7949: anya eva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:7950: anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7952: mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7959: kāyaś cet pratimākāraḥ pesībhasmasu nāsti saḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7960: sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7963: tatra cintaiva me nāsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān /
SA11sanssr_pu:7964: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā caiva dṛśyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:7967: na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇā api /
SA11sanssr_pu:7968: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ naikavidhaṃ jagat //
SA11sanssr_pu:7970: sukhāder na paṭṭotpattiḥ paṭṭādes tu sukhādayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:7974: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā /
SA11sanssr_pu:7976: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamānaṃ na lakṣyate /
SA11sanssr_pu:7977: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7979: tatrābhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate //
SA11sanssr_pu:7981: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parātmanoḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7982: ayuktam api ced etat svātmany astītaratra na /
SA11sanssr_pu:7983: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:7984: kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt /
SA11sanssr_pu:7989: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇāpy arasena kim //
SA11sanssr_pu:7990: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ /
SA11sanssr_pu:8006: tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:8008: loke duṣkhāgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet /
SA11sanssr_pu:8010: ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:8011: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svārtham utsṛjan //
SA11sanssr_pu:8014: yad bhayān notsṛjāmy etat tad evādadato bhayaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:8015: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:8017: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayaiva sā //
SA11sanssr_pu:8021: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vopayojayet //
SA11sanssr_pu:8022: svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ neha duṣkhakṛt /
SA11sanssr_pu:8028: kopaḥ kasyārtham adyāpi mṛṣā vā tan mayoditam //
SA11sanssr_pu:8029: svārthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanssr_pu:8030: nirdayasyāpi kaḥ kopaḥ parārtho yadi naśyati //
SA11sanssr_pu:8034: nāpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogārthaṃ nopayāti ca //
SA11sanssr_pu:8040: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ //
SA11sanssr_pu:8042: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān //
SA11sanssr_pu:8047: ka eva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī /
SA11sanssr_pu:8052: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ para ātmā ca sarvadā //
SA11sanssr_pu:8054: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ mahat //
SA11sanssr_pu:8058: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ //
SA11sanssr_pu:8060: tatraikena raṇāsaktam anye nighnanti māṃ sukham //
SA11sanssr_pu:8061: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā /
SA11sanssr_pu:8062: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt //
SA11sanssr_pu:8071: mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ /
SA11sanssr_pu:8081: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathātyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyopārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me /
SA11sanssr_pu:8082: bhavatu sukham annantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam annantavyomasīmādhipatyaṃ //
